B. 20
C. 40
D. 80
analysis_en:
Solution: From the binomial theorem$\left(x^{2}+\frac{2}{x}\right)^{5}$The expansion term is:$$T_{r+1}=C_{5}^{r}\left(x^{2}\right)^{5-r}\left(\frac{2}{x}\right)^{r}=2^{r} C_{5}^{r} x^{10-3 r}$$Depend on$10-3 r=4$, solve it$r=2$,$\therefore\left(\mathrm{x}^{2}+\frac{2}{\mathrm{x}}\right)^{5}$where the expansion$\mathrm{x}^{4}$The coefficient of$2^{2} \mathrm{C}_{5}^{2}=40$.

So, the correct answer is: C.

question:
6. (5 分) 直线 $x+y+2=0$ 分别与 $x$ 轴, $y$ 轴交于 $A$, B 两点, 点 $P$ 在圆 $(x-2)$ ${ }^{2}+y^{2}=2$ 上，则 $\triangle A B P$ 面积的取值范围是 $(\quad)$
A. $[2,6]$
B. $[4,8]$
C. $[\sqrt{2}, 3 \sqrt{2}]$
D. $[2 \sqrt{2}, 3 \sqrt{2}]$
analysis:
解: $\because$ 直线 $x+y+2=0$ 分别与 $x$ 轴, $y$ 轴交于 $A, B$ 两点, $\therefore$ 令 $\mathrm{x}=0$, 得 $\mathrm{y}=-2$, 令 $\mathrm{y}=0$, 得 $\mathrm{x}=-2$,

$\therefore A(-2,0), B(0,-2),|A B|=\sqrt{4+4}=2 \sqrt{2}$,

$\because$ 点 $P$ 在圆 $(x-2)^{2}+y^{2}=2$ 上, $\therefore$ 设 $P(2+\sqrt{2} \cos \theta, \sqrt{2} \sin \theta)$,

$\therefore$ 点 $\mathrm{P}$ 到直线 $\mathrm{x}+\mathrm{y}+2=0$ 的距离: $\mathrm{d}=\frac{|2+\sqrt{2} \cos \theta+\sqrt{2} \sin \theta+2|}{\sqrt{2}}=\frac{\left|2 \sin \left(\theta+\frac{\pi}{4}\right)+4\right|}{\sqrt{2}}$,

$\because \sin \left(\theta+\frac{\pi}{4}\right) \in[-1,1], \quad \therefore d=\frac{\left|2 \sin \left(\theta+\frac{\pi}{4}\right)+4\right|}{\sqrt{2}} \in[\sqrt{2}, 3 \sqrt{2}]$,

$\therefore \triangle \mathrm{ABP}$ 面积的取值范围是:

$\left[\frac{1}{2} \times 2 \sqrt{2} \times \sqrt{2}, \frac{1}{2} \times 2 \sqrt{2} \times 3 \sqrt{2}\right]=[2,6]$.

故选: $A$.

analysis_en:
solution:$\because$straight line$x+y+2=0$Separate and$x$axis,$y$The axis intersects$A, B$Two o'clock,$\therefore$make$\mathrm{x}=0$, have to$\mathrm{y}=-2$, make$\mathrm{y}=0$, have to$\mathrm{x}=-2$,$\therefore A(-2,0), B(0,-2),|A B|=\sqrt{4+4}=2 \sqrt{2}$,$\because$point$P$In the circle$(x-2)^{2}+y^{2}=2$superior,$\therefore$set up$P(2+\sqrt{2} \cos \theta, \sqrt{2} \sin \theta)$,$\therefore$point$\mathrm{P}$To straight line$\mathrm{x}+\mathrm{y}+2=0$Distance:$\mathrm{d}=\frac{|2+\sqrt{2} \cos \theta+\sqrt{2} \sin \theta+2|}{\sqrt{2}}=\frac{\left|2 \sin \left(\theta+\frac{\pi}{4}\right)+4\right|}{\sqrt{2}}$,$\because \sin \left(\theta+\frac{\pi}{4}\right) \in[-1,1], \quad \therefore d=\frac{\left|2 \sin \left(\theta+\frac{\pi}{4}\right)+4\right|}{\sqrt{2}} \in[\sqrt{2}, 3 \sqrt{2}]$,$\therefore \triangle \mathrm{ABP}$The range of area values ​​is:$\left[\frac{1}{2} \times 2 \sqrt{2} \times \sqrt{2}, \frac{1}{2} \times 2 \sqrt{2} \times 3 \sqrt{2}\right]=[2,6]$.

So, the correct answer is:$A$.

question:

analysis:

question:
11. (5 分) 设 $F_{1}, F_{2}$ 是双曲线 $C: \frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$ 的左, 右焦点, $O$ 是坐标原点. 过 $F_{2}$ 作 $C$ 的一条渐近线的垂线, 垂足为 $P$, 若 $\left|P F_{1}\right|=\sqrt{6}|O P|$, 则 $C$ 的离心率为 $(\quad)$
A. $\sqrt{5}$
B. 2
C. $\sqrt{3}$
D. $\sqrt{2}$
analysis:
解：双曲线 $C: \frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1 \quad(a>0 . b>0)$ 的一条渐近线方程为 $y=\frac{b}{a} x$, $\therefore$ 点 $\mathrm{F}_{2}$ 到渐近线的距离 $\mathrm{d}=\frac{\mathrm{bc}}{\sqrt{\mathrm{a}^{2}+\mathrm{b}^{2}}}=\mathrm{b}$, 即 $\left|P F_{2}\right|=b$,

$\therefore|\mathrm{OP}|=\sqrt{\left|O \mathrm{~F}_{2}\right|^{2}-\left|\mathrm{PF}_{2}\right|^{2}}=\sqrt{c^{2}-\mathrm{b}^{2}}=\mathrm{a}, \quad \cos \angle \mathrm{PF} \mathrm{F}_{2} \mathrm{O}=\frac{\mathrm{b}}{\mathrm{c}}$,

$\because\left|\mathrm{PF}_{1}\right|=\sqrt{6}|\mathrm{OP}|$

$\therefore\left|P F_{1}\right|=\sqrt{6} a$ 在三角形 $F_{1} P F_{2}$ 中, 由余弦定理可得 $\left|P F_{1}\right|^{2}=\left|P F_{2}\right|^{2}+\left|F_{1} F_{2}\right|^{2}-2\left|P F_{2}\right| \cdot\left|F_{1} F_{2}\right| C O S \angle$ $\mathrm{PF}_{2} \mathrm{O}$

$\therefore 6 \mathrm{a}^{2}=\mathrm{b}^{2}+4 c^{2}-2 \times b \times 2 c \times \frac{b}{c}=4 c^{2}-3 b^{2}=4 c^{2}-3 \quad\left(c^{2}-a^{2}\right)$,

即 $3 a^{2}=c^{2}$,

即 $\sqrt{3} a=c$,

$\therefore \mathrm{e}=\frac{\mathrm{c}}{\mathrm{a}}=\sqrt{3}$,

故选: C.
question_en:
11. (5 points) Set$F_{1}, F_{2}$It's a hyperbolic$C: \frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$left, right focus,$O$It is the origin of the coordinates.$F_{2}$do$C$a vertical line of an asymptomatic line, the foot is$P$, like$\left|P F_{1}\right|=\sqrt{6}|O P|$, then $C$The eccentricity rate is$(\quad)$A.$\sqrt{5}$B. 2
C.$\sqrt{3}$D.$\sqrt{2}$

So $3 a^{2}=c^{2}$,

So $\sqrt{3} a=c$,$\therefore \mathrm{e}=\frac{\mathrm{c}}{\mathrm{a}}=\sqrt{3}$,

So, the correct answer is: C.

question:
12. (5 分) 设 $a=\log _{0.2} 0.3, b=\log _{2} 0.3$, 则 $(\quad)$
A. $a+b<a b<0$
B. $a b<a+b<0$
C. $a+b<0<a b$
D. $a b<0<a+b$
analysis:
解: $\because \mathrm{a}=\log _{0.2} 0.3=\frac{1 \mathrm{~g} 0.3}{-\lg 5}, \mathrm{~b}=\log _{2} 0.3=\frac{\lg 0.3}{1 \mathrm{~g} 2}$,

$\therefore \mathrm{a}+\mathrm{b}=\frac{\lg 0.3}{\lg 2}-\frac{\lg 0.3}{\lg 5}=\frac{\lg 0.3(\lg 5-\lg 2)}{\lg 2 \lg 5}=\frac{\lg 0.3 \lg \frac{5}{2}}{\lg 2 \lg 5}$,

$\mathrm{ab}=-\frac{\lg 0.3}{\lg 2} \cdot \frac{\lg 0.3}{\lg 5}=\frac{\lg 0.3 \cdot 1 \mathrm{~g} \frac{10}{3}}{\lg 2 \lg 5}$,

$\because \lg \frac{10}{3}>\lg \frac{5}{2}, \frac{\lg 0.3}{\lg 2 \lg 5}<0$,

$\therefore \mathrm{ab}<\mathrm{a}+\mathrm{b}<0$.

故选: B.
question_en: 12. (5 points) Set$a=\log _{0.2} 0.3, b=\log _{2} 0.3$, then $(\quad)$A.$a+b<a b<0$B.$a b<a+b<0$C.$a+b<0<a b$D.$a b<0<a+b$
analysis_en:
solution:$\because \mathrm{a}=\log _{0.2} 0.3=\frac{1 \mathrm{~g} 0.3}{-\lg 5}, \mathrm{~b}=\log _{2} 0.3=\frac{\lg 0.3}{1 \mathrm{~g} 2}$,$\therefore \mathrm{a}+\mathrm{b}=\frac{\lg 0.3}{\lg 2}-\frac{\lg 0.3}{\lg 5}=\frac{\lg 0.3(\lg 5-\lg 2)}{\lg 2 \lg 5}=\frac{\lg 0.3 \lg \frac{5}{2}}{\lg 2 \lg 5}$,$\mathrm{ab}=-\frac{\lg 0.3}{\lg 2} \cdot \frac{\lg 0.3}{\lg 5}=\frac{\lg 0.3 \cdot 1 \mathrm{~g} \frac{10}{3}}{\lg 2 \lg 5}$,$\because \lg \frac{10}{3}>\lg \frac{5}{2}, \frac{\lg 0.3}{\lg 2 \lg 5}<0$,$\therefore \mathrm{ab}<\mathrm{a}+\mathrm{b}<0$.

So, the correct answer is: B.

question:
1.已知集合 $M=\{x \mid-4<x<2\}, N=\left\{x \mid x^{2}-x-6<0\right\}$, 则 $M \cap N=$
A. $\{x \mid-4<x<3\}$
B. $\{x \mid-4<x<-2\}$
C. $\{x \mid-2<x<2\}$
D.
$\{x \mid 2<x<3\}$
analysis:
【详解】由题意得, $M=\{x \mid-4<x<2\}, N=\{x \mid-2<x<3\}$, 则

$M \cap N=\{x \mid-2<x<2\}$. 故选 C.
question_en: 1. Given collections$M=\{x \mid-4<x<2\}, N=\left\{x \mid x^{2}-x-6<0\right\}$, then $M \cap N=$A.$\{x \mid-4<x<3\}$B.$\{x \mid-4<x<-2\}$C.$\{x \mid-2<x<2\}$D.$\{x \mid 2<x<3\}$
analysis_en: 【Detailed explanation】From the question,$M=\{x \mid-4<x<2\}, N=\{x \mid-2<x<3\}$, then $M \cap N=\{x \mid-2<x<2\}$. So, the correct answer is C.

question:
2. 设复数 $z$ 满足 $|z-\mathrm{i}|=1, z$ 在复平面内对应的点为 $(x, y)$, 则
A. $(x+1)^{2}+y^{2}=1$
B. $(x-1)^{2}+y^{2}=1$
C. $x^{2}+(y-1)^{2}=1$
D.

$x^{2}+(y+1)^{2}=1$
question_en:
2. Let the plural number$z$satisfy$|z-\mathrm{i}|=1, z$The corresponding points in the complex plane are$(x, y)$, but
A.$(x+1)^{2}+y^{2}=1$B.$(x-1)^{2}+y^{2}=1$C.$x^{2}+(y-1)^{2}=1$D.$x^{2}+(y+1)^{2}=1$
analysis_en: 【Detailed explanation】$z=x+y i, z-i==x+(y-1) i,|z-i|=\sqrt{x^{2}+(y-1)^{2}}=1$, then $x^{2}+(y-1)^{2}=1$. So, the correct answer is C.

question:
3.已知 $a=\log _{2} 0.2, b=2^{0.2}, c=0.2^{0.3}$ ，则
A. $a<b<c$
B. $a<c<b$
C. $c<a<b$

$b<c<a$

question:
7.已知非零向量 $\boldsymbol{a}, \boldsymbol{b}$ 满足 $|a|=2|b|$, 且 $(\boldsymbol{a}-\boldsymbol{b}) \perp \boldsymbol{b}$, 则 $\boldsymbol{a}$ 与 $\boldsymbol{b}$ 的夹角为
A. $\frac{\pi}{6}$
B. $\frac{\pi}{3}$
C. $\frac{2 \pi}{3}$
D. $\frac{5 \pi}{6}$
analysis: 【详解】因为 $(a-b) \perp b$, 所以 $(a-b) \cdot b=a \cdot b-b^{2}=0$, 所以 $a \cdot b=b^{2}$, 所以 $\cos \theta=\frac{a \cdot b}{|a| \cdot|b|}=\frac{|b|^{2}}{2|b|^{2}}=\frac{1}{2}$, 所以 $a$ 与 $b$ 的夹角为 $\frac{\pi}{3}$, 故选 B.
question_en:
7. Given non-zero vectors$\boldsymbol{a}, \boldsymbol{b}$satisfy$|a|=2|b|$, and$(\boldsymbol{a}-\boldsymbol{b}) \perp \boldsymbol{b}$, then $\boldsymbol{a}$and$\boldsymbol{b}$The angle of
A.$\frac{\pi}{6}$B.$\frac{\pi}{3}$C.$\frac{2 \pi}{3}$D.$\frac{5 \pi}{6}$
analysis_en: 【Detailed explanation】Because$(a-b) \perp b$, so$(a-b) \cdot b=a \cdot b-b^{2}=0$, so$a \cdot b=b^{2}$, so$\cos \theta=\frac{a \cdot b}{|a| \cdot|b|}=\frac{|b|^{2}}{2|b|^{2}}=\frac{1}{2}$, so$a$and$b$The angle of$\frac{\pi}{3}$, so choose B.

question:
9. 记 $S_{n}$ 为等差数列 $\left\{a_{n}\right\}$ 的前 $n$ 项和. 已知 $S_{4}=0, a_{5}=5$, 则
A. $a_{n}=2 n-5$
B. $a_{n}=3 n-10$
C. $S_{n}=2 n^{2}-8 n$
D. $S_{n}=\frac{1}{2} n^{2}-2 n$
analysis: 【详解】由题知, $\left\{\begin{array}{l}S_{4}=4 a_{1}+\frac{d}{2} \times 4 \times 3=0 \\ a_{5}=a_{1}+4 d=5\end{array}\right.$, 解得 $\left\{\begin{array}{l}a_{1}=-3 \\ d=2\end{array}, \therefore a_{n}=2 n-5\right.$, 故选 A.
question_en:
9. Remember$S_{n}$Arithmetic sequence$\left\{a_{n}\right\}$The front$n$Items and. Given$S_{4}=0, a_{5}=5$, but
A.$a_{n}=2 n-5$B.$a_{n}=3 n-10$C.$S_{n}=2 n^{2}-8 n$D.$S_{n}=\frac{1}{2} n^{2}-2 n$
analysis_en: 【Detailed explanation】From the question,$\left\{\begin{array}{l}S_{4}=4 a_{1}+\frac{d}{2} \times 4 \times 3=0 \\ a_{5}=a_{1}+4 d=5\end{array}\right.$, solve it$\left\{\begin{array}{l}a_{1}=-3 \\ d=2\end{array}, \therefore a_{n}=2 n-5\right.$, so choose A.

question:
11. 关于函数 $f(x)=\sin |x|+|\sin x|$ 有下述四个结论:

(1) $f(x)$ 是偶函数 $\quad$ (2) $f(x)$ 在区间 $\left(\frac{\pi}{2}, \pi\right)$ 单调递增

(3) $f(x)$ 在 $[-\pi, \pi]$ 有 4 个零点 (4) $f(x)$ 的最大值为 2

其中所有正确结论的编号是
A. (1)(2)(4)
B. (2)(4)
C. (1)(4)
D. (1)(3)
analysis:
【详解】 $\because f(-x)=\sin |-x|+|\sin (-x)|=\sin |x|+|\sin x|=f(x), \therefore f(x)$ 为偶函数, 故(1) 正确. 当 $\frac{\pi}{2}<x<\pi$ 时, $f(x)=2 \sin x$, 它在区间 $\left(\frac{\pi}{2}, \pi\right)$ 单调递减, 故(2)错误. 当 $0 \leq x \leq \pi$ 时, $f(x)=2 \sin x$, 它有两个零点: $0 ， \pi$; 当 $-\pi \leq x<0$ 时,

$f(x)=\sin (-x)-\sin x=-2 \sin x$, 它有一个零点: $-\pi$, 故 $f(x)$ 在 $[-\pi, \pi]$ 有 3 个零点:

$-\pi, 0, \pi$, 故(3)错误. 当 $x \in[2 k \pi, 2 k \pi+\pi]\left(k \in \mathbf{N}^{\star}\right)$ 时, $f(x)=2 \sin x$; 当 $x \in[2 k \pi+\pi, 2 k \pi+2 \pi]\left(k \in \mathbf{N}^{*}\right)$ 时, $f(x)=\sin x-\sin x=0$, 又 $f(x)$ 为偶函数,

$\therefore f(x)$ 的最大值为 2 , 故(4)正确. 综上所述, (1)4) 正确, 故选 C.
question_en:
11. About Functions$f(x)=\sin |x|+|\sin x|$There are four conclusions below:

(1)$f(x)$It's an even function$\quad$(2)$f(x)$In the interval$\left(\frac{\pi}{2}, \pi\right)$Monotonously increasing

(3)$f(x)$exist$[-\pi, \pi]$There are 4 zero points (4)$f(x)$The maximum value is 2

The number of all correct conclusions is
A. (1)(2)(4)
B. (2)(4)
C. (1)(4)
D. (1)(3)
analysis_en: 【Detailed explanation】$\because f(-x)=\sin |-x|+|\sin (-x)|=\sin |x|+|\sin x|=f(x), \therefore f(x)$is an even function, so (1) is correct.$\frac{\pi}{2}<x<\pi$hour,$f(x)=2 \sin x$, it is in the interval$\left(\frac{\pi}{2}, \pi\right)$Monotonously decreasing, so (2) is wrong.$0 \leq x \leq \pi$hour,$f(x)=2 \sin x$, it has two zeros:$0 ， \pi$; when$-\pi \leq x<0$hour,$f(x)=\sin (-x)-\sin x=-2 \sin x$, it has a zero point:$-\pi$, therefore$f(x)$exist$[-\pi, \pi]$There are 3 zero points:$-\pi, 0, \pi$, so (3) is wrong.$x \in[2 k \pi, 2 k \pi+\pi]\left(k \in \mathbf{N}^{\star}\right)$hour,$f(x)=2 \sin x$; when$x \in[2 k \pi+\pi, 2 k \pi+2 \pi]\left(k \in \mathbf{N}^{*}\right)$hour,$f(x)=\sin x-\sin x=0$, again$f(x)$is an even function,$\therefore f(x)$The maximum value of 2 is 2, so (4) is correct. To sum up, (1)4) is correct, so choose C.

question:
3. 已知 $\overrightarrow{A B}=(2,3), \overrightarrow{A C}=(3, t), \overrightarrow{B C}=1$, 则 $\overrightarrow{A B} \cdot \overrightarrow{B C}=$
A. -3
B. -2
C. 2
D. 3
analysis: 【详解】由 $\overrightarrow{B C}=\overrightarrow{A C}-\overrightarrow{A B}=(1, t-3),|\overrightarrow{B C}|=\sqrt{1^{2}+(t-3)^{2}}=1$, 得 $t=3$, 则 $\overrightarrow{B C}=(1,0)$, $\overrightarrow{A B} \cdot \overrightarrow{B C}=(2,3) \cdot(1,0)=2 \times 1+3 \times 0=2$. 故选 C.
question_en:

B. -2
C. 2

analysis_en: 【Detailed explanation】B$\overrightarrow{B C}=\overrightarrow{A C}-\overrightarrow{A B}=(1, t-3),|\overrightarrow{B C}|=\sqrt{1^{2}+(t-3)^{2}}=1$, have to$t=3$, then $\overrightarrow{B C}=(1,0)$,$\overrightarrow{A B} \cdot \overrightarrow{B C}=(2,3) \cdot(1,0)=2 \times 1+3 \times 0=2$. So, the correct answer is C.

question:
4.2019 年 1 月 3 日嫦娥四号探测器成功实现人类历史上首次月球背面软着陆, 我国航天 事业取得又一重大成就, 实现月球背面软着陆需要解决的一个关键技术问题是地面与探 测器的通讯联系。 为解决这个问题, 发射了嫦娥四号中继星 “鹊桥”, 鹊桥沿着围绕地 月拉格朗日 $L_{2}$ 点的轨道运行. $L_{2}$ 点是平衡点, 位于地月连线的延长线上. 设地球质量为 $M_{1}$, 月球质量为 $M_{2}$, 地月距离为 $R, L_{2}$ 点到月球的距离为 $r$, 根据牛顿运动定律和万 有引力定律, $r$ 满足方程:

$$
\frac{M_{1}}{(R+r)^{2}}+\frac{M_{2}}{r^{2}}=(R+r) \frac{M_{1}}{R^{3}}
$$

设 $a=\frac{r}{R}$, 由于 $a$ 的值很小, 因此在近似计算中 $\frac{3 a^{3}+3 a^{4}+a^{5}}{(1+a)^{2}} \approx 3 a^{3}$, 则 $r$ 的近似值 为
A. $\sqrt{\frac{M_{2}}{M_{1}}} R$
B. $\sqrt{\frac{M_{2}}{2 M_{1}}} R$
C. $\sqrt[3]{\frac{3 M_{2}}{M_{1}}} R$
D. $\sqrt[3]{\frac{M_{2}}{3 M_{1}}} R$
question_en:
4. On January 3, 2019, the Chang'e-4 probe successfully achieved the first soft landing on the back of the moon in human history. my country's aerospace industry has made another major achievement. A key technical problem that needs to be solved to achieve soft landing on the back of the moon is the communication connection between the ground and the probe. To solve this problem, the Chang'e-4 relay satellite "Magpie Bridge", was launched, which is along the ground, the moon, Lagrangian.$L_{2}$orbit of the point.$L_{2}$The point is the equilibrium point, located on the extension line of the earth-moon line. Suppose the earth's mass is$M_{1}$, the moon's mass is$M_{2}$, the distance between the earth and the moon is$R, L_{2}$The distance from the point to the moon is$r$, according to Newton's law of motion and the law of gravity,$r$Satisfies the equation:$$\frac{M_{1}}{(R+r)^{2}}+\frac{M_{2}}{r^{2}}=(R+r) \frac{M_{1}}{R^{3}}$$set up$a=\frac{r}{R}$, because$a$The value of$\frac{3 a^{3}+3 a^{4}+a^{5}}{(1+a)^{2}} \approx 3 a^{3}$, then $r$The approximate value of
A.$\sqrt{\frac{M_{2}}{M_{1}}} R$B.$\sqrt{\frac{M_{2}}{2 M_{1}}} R$C.$\sqrt[3]{\frac{3 M_{2}}{M_{1}}} R$D.$\sqrt[3]{\frac{M_{2}}{3 M_{1}}} R$

question:
5. 演讲比赛共有 9 位评委分别给出某选手的原始评分, 评定该选手的成绩时, 从 9 个原 始评分中去掉 1 个最高分、 1 个最低分, 得到 7 个有效评分. 7 个有效评分与 9 个原始评 分相比, 不变的数字特征是
A. 中位数
B. 平均数
C. 方差
D. 极差
analysis:
【详解】设 9 位评委评分按从小到大排列为 $x_{1}<x_{2}<x_{3}<x_{4} \cdots<x_{8}<x_{9}$.

则(1)原始中位数为 $x_{5}$, 去掉最低分 $x_{1}$, 最高分 $x_{9}$, 后剩余 $x_{2}<x_{3}<x_{4} \cdots<x_{8}$,

中位数仍为 $x_{5}, \therefore \mathrm{A}$ 正确.

(2)原始平均数 $\bar{x}=\frac{1}{9}\left(x_{1}<x_{2}<x_{3}<x_{4} \cdots<x_{8}<x_{9}\right)$, 后来平均数 $\overline{x^{\prime}}=\frac{1}{7}\left(x_{2}<x_{3}<x_{4} \cdots<x_{8}\right)$

平均数受极端值影响较大, $\therefore \bar{x}$ 与 $\overline{x^{1}}$ 不一定相同, B 不正确

(3) $S^{2}=\frac{1}{9}\left[\left(x_{1}-\bar{x}\right)^{2}+\left(x_{1}-\bar{x}\right)^{2}+\cdots+\left(x_{q}-\bar{x}\right)^{2}\right]$

$s^{\prime 2}=\frac{1}{7}\left[\left(x_{2}-\overline{x^{\prime}}\right)^{2}+\left(x_{3}-\overline{x^{\prime}}\right)^{2}+\cdots+\left(x_{8}-\overline{x^{\prime}}\right)^{2}\right]$ 由(2)易知, C 不正确.

(4)原极差 $=x_{9}-x_{1}$, 后来极差 $=x_{8}-x_{2}$ 显然极差变小, $\mathrm{D}$ 不正确.
question_en:
5. A total of 9 judges in the speech contest gave the original score of a contestant. When evaluating the contestant's score, 1 highest score and 1 lowest score were removed from the 9 original scores, and 7 valid scores were obtained. Compared with 9 original scores, the unchanging numerical characteristics are
A. Median
B. Average
C. Variance
D. Extremely poor
analysis_en:
【Detailed explanation】Suppose the ratings of 9 judges are arranged from small to large$x_{1}<x_{2}<x_{3}<x_{4} \cdots<x_{8}<x_{9}$.

Then (1) the original median is$x_{5}$, remove the lowest score$x_{1}$, the best$x_{9}$, and the remaining$x_{2}<x_{3}<x_{4} \cdots<x_{8}$,

The median is still$x_{5}, \therefore \mathrm{A}$correct.

(2) Original average$\bar{x}=\frac{1}{9}\left(x_{1}<x_{2}<x_{3}<x_{4} \cdots<x_{8}<x_{9}\right)$, Later average$\overline{x^{\prime}}=\frac{1}{7}\left(x_{2}<x_{3}<x_{4} \cdots<x_{8}\right)$The average is greatly affected by extreme values.$\therefore \bar{x}$and$\overline{x^{1}}$Not necessarily the same, B is incorrect

(3)$S^{2}=\frac{1}{9}\left[\left(x_{1}-\bar{x}\right)^{2}+\left(x_{1}-\bar{x}\right)^{2}+\cdots+\left(x_{q}-\bar{x}\right)^{2}\right]$$s^{\prime 2}=\frac{1}{7}\left[\left(x_{2}-\overline{x^{\prime}}\right)^{2}+\left(x_{3}-\overline{x^{\prime}}\right)^{2}+\cdots+\left(x_{8}-\overline{x^{\prime}}\right)^{2}\right]$From (2) it is easy to know that C is incorrect.

(4) Original Poor$=x_{9}-x_{1}$, It was extremely bad later$=x_{8}-x_{2}$Obviously the difference becomes smaller,$\mathrm{D}$Incorrect.

question:
6. 若 $a>b$, 则
A. $\ln (a-b)>0$
B. $3^{a}<3^{b}$
C. $a^{3}-b^{3}>0$
D. $|a|>|b|$
analysis: 【详解】取 $a=2, b=1$, 满足 $a>b, \ln (a-b)=0$, 知 $\mathrm{A}$ 错, 排除 $\mathrm{A}$; 因为 $9=3^{a}>3^{b}=3$, 知 B 错, 排除 B; 取 $a=1, b=-2$, 满足 $a>b, 1=|a|<|b|=2$, 知 $\mathrm{D}$ 错, 排除 $\mathrm{D}$, 因为 幂函数 $y=x^{3}$ 是增函数, $a>b$, 所以 $a^{3}>b^{3}$, 故选 C.
analysis_en: 【Detailed explanation】Get$a=2, b=1$, satisfy$a>b, \ln (a-b)=0$, Know$\mathrm{A}$Wrong, exclude$\mathrm{A}$; because$9=3^{a}>3^{b}=3$, know that B is wrong, exclude B; take$a=1, b=-2$, satisfy$a>b, 1=|a|<|b|=2$, Know$\mathrm{D}$Wrong, exclude$\mathrm{D}$, because power function$y=x^{3}$It is an incremental function,$a>b$, so$a^{3}>b^{3}$, so choose C.

question:

B. $\alpha$ 内有两条相交直线与 $\beta$ 平行

analysis:

由面面平行性质定理知, 若 $a / / \beta$, 则 $a$ 内任意一条直线都与 $\beta$ 平行, 所以 $a$ 内两条相交 直线都与 $\beta$ 平行是 $a / / \beta$ 的必要条件, 故选 $\mathrm{B}$.

From the theorem of the parallel properties of the face, if$a / / \beta$, then $a$Any straight line in$\beta$Parallel, so$a$The two intersects the straight line$\beta$Parallel is$a / / \beta$The necessary conditions for$\mathrm{B}$.

question:
8. 若抛物线 $y^{2}=2 p x \quad(p>0)$ 的焦点是椭圆 $\frac{x^{2}}{3 p}+\frac{y^{2}}{p}=1$ 的一个焦点, 则 $p=$
A. 2
B. 3
C. 4
D. 8
analysis: 【详解】因为抛物线 $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$ 的焦点 $\left(\frac{p}{2}, 0\right)$ 是椭圆 $\frac{x^{2}}{3 p}+\frac{y^{2}}{p}=1$ 的一个焦点, 所以 $3 p-p=\left(\frac{p}{2}\right)^{2}$, 解得 $p=8$, 故选 $\mathrm{D}$.
question_en:
8. If the parabola$y^{2}=2 p x \quad(p>0)$The focus is the ellipse$\frac{x^{2}}{3 p}+\frac{y^{2}}{p}=1$a focus of$p=$A. 2
B. 3
C. 4
D. 8
analysis_en: 【Detailed explanation】Because parabola$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$Focus$\left(\frac{p}{2}, 0\right)$It's an ellipse$\frac{x^{2}}{3 p}+\frac{y^{2}}{p}=1$a focus, so$3 p-p=\left(\frac{p}{2}\right)^{2}$, solve it$p=8$, so choose$\mathrm{D}$.

question:
10.已知 $a \in\left(0, \frac{\pi}{2}\right), 2 \sin 2 \alpha=\cos 2 \alpha+1$, 则 $\sin \alpha=$
A. $\frac{1}{5}$
B. $\frac{\sqrt{5}}{5}$
C. $\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}$
D. $\frac{2 \sqrt{5}}{5}$
analysis: 【详解】 $\because 2 \sin 2 a=\cos 2 a+1, \therefore 4 \sin a \cdot \cos a=2 \cos ^{2} a \because a \in\left(0, \frac{\pi}{2}\right), \therefore \cos a>0$. $\sin a>0, \therefore 2 \sin a=\cos a$, 又 $\sin ^{2} a+\cos ^{2} a=1, \therefore 5 \sin ^{2} a=1, \quad \sin ^{2} a=\frac{1}{5}$, 又 $\sin a>0, \therefore \sin a=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{5}$, 故选 B.
question_en: 10. Given$a \in\left(0, \frac{\pi}{2}\right), 2 \sin 2 \alpha=\cos 2 \alpha+1$, then $\sin \alpha=$A.$\frac{1}{5}$B.$\frac{\sqrt{5}}{5}$C.$\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}$D.$\frac{2 \sqrt{5}}{5}$
analysis_en: 【Detailed explanation】$\because 2 \sin 2 a=\cos 2 a+1, \therefore 4 \sin a \cdot \cos a=2 \cos ^{2} a \because a \in\left(0, \frac{\pi}{2}\right), \therefore \cos a>0$.$\sin a>0, \therefore 2 \sin a=\cos a$, again$\sin ^{2} a+\cos ^{2} a=1, \therefore 5 \sin ^{2} a=1, \quad \sin ^{2} a=\frac{1}{5}$, again$\sin a>0, \therefore \sin a=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{5}$, so choose B.

question:
2. 若 $z(1+\mathrm{i})=2 \mathrm{i}$ ，则 $z=(\quad)$
A. $-1-\mathrm{i}$
B. $-1+\mathrm{i}$
C. $1-\mathrm{i}$
D. $1+i$
analysis: 【详解】 $z=\frac{2 \mathrm{i}}{1+\mathrm{i}}=\frac{2 \mathrm{i}(1-\mathrm{i})}{(1+\mathrm{i})(1-\mathrm{i})}=1+\mathrm{i}$. 故选 D.
question_en: 2. If$z(1+\mathrm{i})=2 \mathrm{i}$,then $z=(\quad)$A.$-1-\mathrm{i}$B.$-1+\mathrm{i}$C.$1-\mathrm{i}$D.$1+i$
analysis_en: 【Detailed explanation】$z=\frac{2 \mathrm{i}}{1+\mathrm{i}}=\frac{2 \mathrm{i}(1-\mathrm{i})}{(1+\mathrm{i})(1-\mathrm{i})}=1+\mathrm{i}$. So, the correct answer is D.

question:
3. 《西游记》《三国演义》《水淓传》和《红楼梦》是中国古典文学瑰宝, 并称为中国古典小 说四大名著. 某中学为了解本校学生阅读四大名著的情况, 随机调查了 100 学生, 其中阅读 过《西游记》或《红楼梦》的学生共有 90 位, 阅读过 《红楼梦》的学生共有 80 位, 阅读过 《西游记》且阅读过 《红楼梦》的学生共有 60 位, 则该校阅读过 《西游记》的学生人数与 该校学生总数比值的估计值为 $(\quad)$
A. 0.5
B. 0.6
C. 0.7
D. 0.8
analysis: 【详解】由题意得, 阅读过 《西游记》的学生人数为 $90-80+60=70$, 则其与该校学生人数之 比为 $70 \div 100=0$. 7. 故选 C.
question_en:
3. "Journey to the West", "Romance of the Three Kingdoms", "Biography of Shuihuang" and "Dream of Red Mansions" are treasures of Chinese classical literature, and are also known as the four classical novels of Chinese classical novels. In order to understand the situation of students reading the four classics of our school, a middle school randomly surveyed 100 students, of which 90 students have read "Journey to the West" or "Dream of Red Mansions", 80 students have read "Dream of Red Mansions", 60 students have read "Dream of Red Mansions", and the estimated ratio of the number of students who have read "Journey to the West" to the total number of students in the school is$(\quad)$A. 0.5
B. 0.6
C. 0.7
D. 0.8
analysis_en: [Detailed explanation] From the question, the number of students who have read "Journey to the West" is$90-80+60=70$, then the ratio of the number of students in the school is$70 \div 100=0$. 7. So, the correct answer is C.

question:
5.已知各项均为正数的等比数列 $\left\{a_{n}\right\}$ 的前 4 项和为 15 , 且 $a_{5}=3 a_{3}+4 a_{1}$, 则 $a_{3}=(\quad)$ 
A. 16
B. 8
C. 4
D. 2
analysis: 【详解】设正数的等比数列 $\left\{a_{n}\right\}$ 的公比为 $q$, 则 $\left\{\begin{array}{l}a_{1}+a_{1} q+a_{1} q^{2}+a_{1} q^{3}=15 \text {, } \\ a_{1} q^{4}=3 a_{1} q^{2}+4 a_{1}\end{array}\right.$, 解得 $\left\{\begin{array}{l}a_{1}=1, \\ q=2\end{array}, \therefore a_{3}=a_{1} q^{2}=4\right.$, 故选 C.
question_en:
5. Equal ratio sequences with all terms known to be positive$\left\{a_{n}\right\}$The sum of the first 4 items is 15, and$a_{5}=3 a_{3}+4 a_{1}$, then $a_{3}=(\quad)$A. 16
B. 8
C. 4
D. 2
analysis_en: 【Detailed explanation】Set the equal-ratio sequence of positive numbers$\left\{a_{n}\right\}$The common ratio is$q$, then $\left\{\begin{array}{l}a_{1}+a_{1} q+a_{1} q^{2}+a_{1} q^{3}=15 \text {, } \\ a_{1} q^{4}=3 a_{1} q^{2}+4 a_{1}\end{array}\right.$, solve it$\left\{\begin{array}{l}a_{1}=1, \\ q=2\end{array}, \therefore a_{3}=a_{1} q^{2}=4\right.$, so choose C.

question:

question:
11. 设 $f(x)$ 是定义域为 $R$ 的偶函数, 且在 $(0,+\infty)$ 单调递减, 则 $(\quad)$
A. $f\left(\log _{5} \frac{1}{4}\right)>f\left(2^{-\frac{3}{2}}\right)>f\left(2^{-\frac{2}{3}}\right)$
B. $f\left(\log _{8} \frac{1}{4}\right)>f\left(2^{-\frac{2}{3}}\right)>f\left(2^{-\frac{3}{2}}\right)$
C. $f\left(2^{-\frac{3}{2}}\right)>f\left(2^{-\frac{2}{3}}\right)>f\left(\log _{5} \frac{1}{4}\right)$
D. $f\left(2^{-\frac{2}{3}}\right)>f\left(2^{-\frac{3}{2}}\right)>f\left(\log _{5} \frac{1}{4}\right)$
analysis:
【详解】 $\because f(x)$ 是 $\mathrm{R}$ 的偶函数, $\therefore f\left(\log _{3} \frac{1}{4}\right)=f\left(\log _{3} 4\right)$.

$\therefore \log _{3} 4>1=2^{0}>2^{-\frac{3}{2}}$, 又 $f(x)$ 在 $(0,+\infty)$ 单调递减, $f\left(\log _{3} 4\right)<f\left(2^{-\frac{2}{3}}\right)<f\left(2^{-\frac{3}{2}}\right)$,

$\therefore f\left(2^{-\frac{3}{2}}\right)>f\left(2^{-\frac{2}{3}}\right)>f\left(\log _{3} \frac{1}{4}\right)$, 故选 C.
question_en: 11. Set$f(x)$is defined as$R$Even function, and$(0,+\infty)$monotonically decreasing,$(\quad)$A.$f\left(\log _{5} \frac{1}{4}\right)>f\left(2^{-\frac{3}{2}}\right)>f\left(2^{-\frac{2}{3}}\right)$B.$f\left(\log _{8} \frac{1}{4}\right)>f\left(2^{-\frac{2}{3}}\right)>f\left(2^{-\frac{3}{2}}\right)$C.$f\left(2^{-\frac{3}{2}}\right)>f\left(2^{-\frac{2}{3}}\right)>f\left(\log _{5} \frac{1}{4}\right)$D.$f\left(2^{-\frac{2}{3}}\right)>f\left(2^{-\frac{3}{2}}\right)>f\left(\log _{5} \frac{1}{4}\right)$
analysis_en: 【Detailed explanation】$\because f(x)$is$\mathrm{R}$Even function,$\therefore f\left(\log _{3} \frac{1}{4}\right)=f\left(\log _{3} 4\right)$.$\therefore \log _{3} 4>1=2^{0}>2^{-\frac{3}{2}}$, again$f(x)$exist$(0,+\infty)$Monotonously decreasing,$f\left(\log _{3} 4\right)<f\left(2^{-\frac{2}{3}}\right)<f\left(2^{-\frac{3}{2}}\right)$,$\therefore f\left(2^{-\frac{3}{2}}\right)>f\left(2^{-\frac{2}{3}}\right)>f\left(\log _{3} \frac{1}{4}\right)$, so choose C.

question:
12. 设函数 $f(x)=\sin \left(\omega x+\frac{\pi}{5}\right)(\omega>0)$, 已知 $f(x)$ 在 $[0,2 \pi]$ 有且仅有 5 个零点, 下 述四个结论:

(1) $f(x)$ 在 $(0,2 \pi)$ 有且仅有 3 个极大值点

(2) $f(x)$ 在 $(0,2 \pi)$ 有且仅有 2 个极小值点 (3) $f(x)$ 在 $\left(0, \frac{\pi}{10}\right)$ 单调递增

(4) 的取值范围是 $\left[\frac{12}{5}, \frac{29}{10}\right)$

其中所有正确结论的编号是
A. (1)(4)
B. (2)(3)
C. (1)(2)(3)
D. (1)(3)(4)
analysis:
【详解】 $\because f(x)=\sin \left(w x+\frac{\pi}{5}\right)(w>0)$, 在 $[0,2 \pi]$ 有且仅有 5 个零点. $\therefore 0 \leq x \leq 2 \pi$ ， $\frac{1}{5} \leq w x+\frac{\pi}{5} \leq 2 \pi w+\frac{\pi}{5}, \frac{12}{5} \leq w<\frac{29}{10}$, (4)正确. 如图 $x_{1}, x_{2}, x_{3}$ 为极大值点为 3 个, (1)正 确; 极小值点为 2 个或 3 个. $\therefore$ (2)不正确.

当 $0<x<\frac{\pi}{10}$ 时, $\frac{\pi}{5}<w x+\frac{\pi}{f}<\frac{w \pi}{10}+\frac{\pi}{5}$, 当 $w=\frac{29}{10}$ 时,

$\frac{w \pi}{10}+\frac{\pi}{5}=\frac{29 \pi}{100}+\frac{20 \pi}{100}=\frac{49 \pi}{100}<\frac{\pi}{2}$.

$\therefore$ (3)正确, 故选 D.
question_en:
12. Suppose the function$f(x)=\sin \left(\omega x+\frac{\pi}{5}\right)(\omega>0)$, known$f(x)$exist$[0,2 \pi]$There are only 5 zero points, and the following four conclusions are given:

(1)$f(x)$exist$(0,2 \pi)$There are only 3 maximum points

(2)$f(x)$exist$(0,2 \pi)$There are only 2 minimum points (3)$f(x)$exist$\left(0, \frac{\pi}{10}\right)$Monotonously increasing

The value range of (4) is$\left[\frac{12}{5}, \frac{29}{10}\right)$The number of all correct conclusions is
A. (1)(4)
B. (2)(3)
C. (1)(2)(3)
D. (1)(3)(4)
analysis_en:
【Detailed explanation】$\because f(x)=\sin \left(w x+\frac{\pi}{5}\right)(w>0)$, exist$[0,2 \pi]$There are only 5 zero points.$\therefore 0 \leq x \leq 2 \pi$，$\frac{1}{5} \leq w x+\frac{\pi}{5} \leq 2 \pi w+\frac{\pi}{5}, \frac{12}{5} \leq w<\frac{29}{10}$, (4) Correct. As shown in the figure$x_{1}, x_{2}, x_{3}$There are 3 maximum points, (1) Correct; there are 2 or 3 minimum points.$\therefore$(2) Incorrect.

when$0<x<\frac{\pi}{10}$hour,$\frac{\pi}{5}<w x+\frac{\pi}{f}<\frac{w \pi}{10}+\frac{\pi}{5}$, when$w=\frac{29}{10}$hour,$\frac{w \pi}{10}+\frac{\pi}{5}=\frac{29 \pi}{100}+\frac{20 \pi}{100}=\frac{49 \pi}{100}<\frac{\pi}{2}$.$\therefore$(3) Correct, so choose D.

question:
1.已知集合 $A=\left\{(x, y) \mid x, y \in \mathbf{N}^{*}, y \geq x\right\}, B=\{(x, y) \mid x+y=8\}$, 则 $A \cap B$ 中元素的个数为 $(\quad)$
A. 2
B. 3
C. 4
D. 6
analysis:
【详解】由题意, $A \cap B$ 中的元素满足 $\left\{\begin{array}{c}y \geq x \\ x+y=8\end{array}\right.$, 且 $x, y \in N^{*}$,

由 $x+y=8 \geq 2 x$, 得 $x \leq 4$,

所以满足 $x+y=8$ 的有 $(1,7),(2,6),(3,5),(4,4)$,

故 $A \cap B$ 中元素的个数为 4 .

故选: C.

【点晴】本题主要考查集合的交集运算, 考查学生对交集定义的理解, 是一道容易题.
question_en:

B. 3
C. 4
D. 6
analysis_en:
【Detailed explanation】By the question,$A \cap B$The elements in it satisfy$\left\{\begin{array}{c}y \geq x \\ x+y=8\end{array}\right.$, and$x, y \in N^{*}$,

Depend on$x+y=8 \geq 2 x$, have to$x \leq 4$,

So satisfied$x+y=8$There is$(1,7),(2,6),(3,5),(4,4)$,

So$A \cap B$The number of elements in it is 4.

So, the correct answer is: C.

question:
2.复数 $\frac{1}{1-3 i}$ 的虚部是 $(\quad)$
A. $-\frac{3}{10}$
B. $-\frac{1}{10}$
C. $\frac{1}{10}$
D. $\frac{3}{10}$
analysis:
【详解】 因为 $z=\frac{1}{1-3 i}=\frac{1+3 i}{(1-3 i)(1+3 i)}=\frac{1}{10}+\frac{3}{10} i$,

所以复数 $z=\frac{1}{1-3 i}$ 的虚部为 $\frac{3}{10}$.

故选: D.

【点晴】本题主要考查复数的除法运算, 涉及到复数的虚部的定义, 是一道基础题.

So plural$z=\frac{1}{1-3 i}$The imaginary part of$\frac{3}{10}$.

So, the correct answer is: D.

[Douqing] This question mainly tests the division operation of complex numbers, involving the definition of imaginary parts of complex numbers, and is a basic question.

question:
4.Logistic 模型是常用数学模型之一, 可应用于流行病学领城. 有学者根据公布数据建立了某 地区新冠肺炎累计确诊病例数 $I(t)\left(t\right.$ 的单位: 天)的 Logistic 模型: $I(t)=\frac{K}{1+\mathrm{e}^{-0.23(t-53)}}$, 其中 $K$ 为最大确诊病例数．当 $I\left(t^{*}\right)=0.95 K$ 时，标志着已初步遏制疫情, 则 $t^{*}$ 约为 $(\quad) \quad(\ln 19 \approx 3)$
A. 60
B. 63
C. 66
D. 69
analysis:
【详解】 $\because I(t)=\frac{K}{1+e^{-0.23(t-53)}}$, 所以 $I\left(t^{\star}\right)=\frac{K}{1+e^{-0.23\left(t^{*}-53\right)}}=0.95 K$, 则 $e^{0.23\left(t^{*}-53\right)}=19$,

所以, $0.23\left(t^{*}-53\right)=\ln 19 \approx 3$, 解得 $t^{\star} \approx \frac{3}{0.23}+53 \approx 66$.

故选: C.
question_en:
4. The Logistic model is one of the commonly used mathematical models and can be applied to epidemiological leaders. Some scholars have established the cumulative number of confirmed cases of new coronavirus pneumonia in a certain region based on published data.$I(t)\left(t\right.$Unit: Days) Logistic model:$I(t)=\frac{K}{1+\mathrm{e}^{-0.23(t-53)}}$, in$K$The maximum number of confirmed cases. when$I\left(t^{*}\right)=0.95 K$When the epidemic has been initially curbed,$t^{*}$Approximately$(\quad) \quad(\ln 19 \approx 3)$A. 60
B. 63
C. 66
D. 69
analysis_en:
【Detailed explanation】$\because I(t)=\frac{K}{1+e^{-0.23(t-53)}}$, so$I\left(t^{\star}\right)=\frac{K}{1+e^{-0.23\left(t^{*}-53\right)}}=0.95 K$, then $e^{0.23\left(t^{*}-53\right)}=19$,

so,$0.23\left(t^{*}-53\right)=\ln 19 \approx 3$, solve it$t^{\star} \approx \frac{3}{0.23}+53 \approx 66$.

So, the correct answer is: C.

question:
5. 设 $O$ 为坐标原点, 直线 $x=2$ 与抛物线 $C: y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$ 交于 $D, E$ 两点, 若 $O D \perp O E$, 则 $C$ 的焦点坐标为 $(\quad)$
A. $\left(\frac{1}{4}, 0\right)$
B. $\left(\frac{1}{2}, 0\right)$
C. $(1,0)$
D. $(2,0)$
analysis: 【详解】因为直线 $x=2$ 与抛物线 $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$ 交于 $C, D$ 两点, 且 $O D \perp O E$, 根据抛物线的对称性可以确定 $\angle D O x=\angle C O x=\frac{\pi}{4}$, 所以 $C(2,2)$ ， 代人抛物线方程 $4=4 p$, 求得 $p=1$, 所以其焦点坐标为 $\left(\frac{1}{2}, 0\right)$, 故选: B.
question_en: 5. Set$O$as the origin of the coordinates, straight line$x=2$With parabola$C: y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$Handed in$D, E$Two points, if$O D \perp O E$, then $C$The focus coordinates are$(\quad)$A.$\left(\frac{1}{4}, 0\right)$B.$\left(\frac{1}{2}, 0\right)$C.$(1,0)$D.$(2,0)$
analysis_en: 【Detailed explanation】Because straight lines$x=2$With parabola$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$Handed in$C, D$Two o'clock, and$O D \perp O E$, according to the symmetry of the parabola, it can be determined$\angle D O x=\angle C O x=\frac{\pi}{4}$, so$C(2,2)$, Parabola equation$4=4 p$, find it$p=1$So, its focus coordinate is$\left(\frac{1}{2}, 0\right)$, so answer is: B.

question:
6. 已知向量 $\boldsymbol{a}, \boldsymbol{b}$ 满足 $|a|=5,|b|=6, a \cdot b=-6$, 则 $\cos \langle\boldsymbol{a}, \boldsymbol{a}+\boldsymbol{b}\rangle=(\quad)$
A. $-\frac{31}{35}$
B. $-\frac{19}{35}$
C. $\frac{17}{35}$
D. $\frac{19}{35}$
analysis:
【详解】 $\because|\vec{a}|=5,|\vec{b}|=6, \vec{a} \cdot \vec{b}=-6, \quad \therefore \vec{a} \cdot(\vec{a}+\vec{b})=|\vec{a}|^{2}+\vec{a} \cdot \vec{b}=5^{2}-6=19$ ．

$|\vec{a}+\vec{b}|=\sqrt{(\vec{a}+\vec{b})^{2}}=\sqrt{\vec{a}^{2}+2 \vec{a} \cdot \vec{b}+\vec{b}^{2}}=\sqrt{25-2 \times 6+36}=7$

因此, $\cos \langle\vec{a}, \vec{a}+\vec{b}\rangle=\frac{\vec{a} \cdot(\vec{a}+\vec{b})}{|\vec{a}| \cdot|\vec{a}+\vec{b}|}=\frac{19}{5 \times 7}=\frac{19}{35}$.

故选: D.
question_en: 6. Given vectors$\boldsymbol{a}, \boldsymbol{b}$satisfy$|a|=5,|b|=6, a \cdot b=-6$, then $\cos \langle\boldsymbol{a}, \boldsymbol{a}+\boldsymbol{b}\rangle=(\quad)$A.$-\frac{31}{35}$B.$-\frac{19}{35}$C.$\frac{17}{35}$D.$\frac{19}{35}$
analysis_en:
【Detailed explanation】$\because|\vec{a}|=5,|\vec{b}|=6, \vec{a} \cdot \vec{b}=-6, \quad \therefore \vec{a} \cdot(\vec{a}+\vec{b})=|\vec{a}|^{2}+\vec{a} \cdot \vec{b}=5^{2}-6=19$．$|\vec{a}+\vec{b}|=\sqrt{(\vec{a}+\vec{b})^{2}}=\sqrt{\vec{a}^{2}+2 \vec{a} \cdot \vec{b}+\vec{b}^{2}}=\sqrt{25-2 \times 6+36}=7$therefore,$\cos \langle\vec{a}, \vec{a}+\vec{b}\rangle=\frac{\vec{a} \cdot(\vec{a}+\vec{b})}{|\vec{a}| \cdot|\vec{a}+\vec{b}|}=\frac{19}{5 \times 7}=\frac{19}{35}$.

So, the correct answer is: D.

question:
7. 在 $\triangle A B C$ 中, $\cos C=\frac{2}{3}, A C=4, B C=3$, 则 $\cos B=(\quad)$
A. $\frac{1}{9}$
B. $\frac{1}{3}$
C. $\frac{1}{2}$
D. $\frac{2}{3}$
analysis:
【详解】 $\because$ 在 $\triangle A B C$ 中, $\cos C=\frac{2}{3}, A C=4, B C=3$

根据余弦定理: $A B^{2}=A C^{2}+B C^{2}-2 A C \cdot B C \cdot \cos C$ $A B^{2}=4^{2}+3^{2}-2 \times 4 \times 3 \times \frac{2}{3}$

可得 $A B^{2}=9$ ， 即 $A B=3$

由 $\because \cos B=\frac{A B^{2}+B C^{2}-A C^{2}}{2 A B \cdot B C}=\frac{9+9-16}{2 \times 3 \times 3}=\frac{1}{9}$

故 $\cos B=\frac{1}{9}$.

故选: A.
question_en: 7. In$\triangle A B C$middle,$\cos C=\frac{2}{3}, A C=4, B C=3$, then $\cos B=(\quad)$A.$\frac{1}{9}$B.$\frac{1}{3}$C.$\frac{1}{2}$D.$\frac{2}{3}$
analysis_en:
【Detailed explanation】$\because$exist$\triangle A B C$middle,$\cos C=\frac{2}{3}, A C=4, B C=3$According to the cosine theorem:$A B^{2}=A C^{2}+B C^{2}-2 A C \cdot B C \cdot \cos C$$A B^{2}=4^{2}+3^{2}-2 \times 4 \times 3 \times \frac{2}{3}$So$A B^{2}=9$, So $A B=3$Depend on$\because \cos B=\frac{A B^{2}+B C^{2}-A C^{2}}{2 A B \cdot B C}=\frac{9+9-16}{2 \times 3 \times 3}=\frac{1}{9}$So$\cos B=\frac{1}{9}$.

So, the correct answer is: A.

question:
9. 已知 $2 \tan \theta-\tan \left(\theta+\frac{\pi}{4}\right)=7$, 则 $\tan \theta=(\quad)$
A. -2
B. -1
C. 1
D. 2
analysis:
【详解】 $\because 2 \tan \theta-\tan \left(\theta+\frac{\pi}{4}\right)=7, \therefore 2 \tan \theta-\frac{\tan \theta+1}{1-\tan \theta}=7$,

令 $t=\tan \theta, t \neq 1$, 则 $2 t-\frac{1+t}{1-t}=7$, 整理得 $t^{2}-4 t+4=0$, 解得 $t=2$, 即 $\tan \theta=2$.

故选: D.
question_en:

B. -1
C. 1

make$t=\tan \theta, t \neq 1$, then $2 t-\frac{1+t}{1-t}=7$, sorted out$t^{2}-4 t+4=0$, solve it$t=2$, So $\tan \theta=2$.

So, the correct answer is: D.

question:
10. 若直线 $l$ 与曲线 $y=\sqrt{x}$ 和 $x^{2}+y^{2}=\frac{1}{5}$ 都相切, 则 $l$ 的方程为 $(\quad)$
A. $y=2 x+1$
B. $y=2 x+\frac{1}{2}$
C. $y=\frac{1}{2} x+1$
D.

$y=\frac{1}{2} x+\frac{1}{2}$
analysis:
【详解】设直线 $l$ 在曲线 $y=\sqrt{x}$ 上的切点为 $\left(x_{0}, \sqrt{x_{0}}\right)$, 则 $x_{0}>0$,

函数 $y=\sqrt{x}$ 的导数为 $y^{\prime}=\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}}$, 则直线 $l$ 的斜率 $k=\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x_{0}}}$,

设直线 $l$ 的方程为 $y-\sqrt{x_{0}}=\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x_{0}}}\left(x-x_{0}\right)$, 即 $x-2 \sqrt{x_{0}} y+x_{0}=0$,

由于直线 $l$ 与圆 $x^{2}+y^{2}=\frac{1}{5}$ 相切, 则 $\frac{x_{0}}{\sqrt{1+4 x_{0}}}=\frac{1}{\sqrt{5}}$,

两边平方并整理得 $5 x_{0}^{2}-4 x_{0}-1=0$, 解得 $x_{0}=1, x_{0}=-\frac{1}{5}$ (舍),

则直线 $l$ 的方程为 $x-2 y+1=0$, 即 $y=\frac{1}{2} x+\frac{1}{2}$.

故选: D.
question_en: 10. If straight lines$l$With curve$y=\sqrt{x}$and$x^{2}+y^{2}=\frac{1}{5}$All tangent,$l$The equation of$(\quad)$A.$y=2 x+1$B.$y=2 x+\frac{1}{2}$C.$y=\frac{1}{2} x+1$D.$y=\frac{1}{2} x+\frac{1}{2}$
analysis_en:
【Detailed explanation】Set a straight line$l$On the curve$y=\sqrt{x}$The point in the tangent is$\left(x_{0}, \sqrt{x_{0}}\right)$, then $x_{0}>0$,

function$y=\sqrt{x}$The derivative of$y^{\prime}=\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x}}$, then straight line$l$Slope of$k=\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x_{0}}}$,

Set a straight line$l$The equation of$y-\sqrt{x_{0}}=\frac{1}{2 \sqrt{x_{0}}}\left(x-x_{0}\right)$, So $x-2 \sqrt{x_{0}} y+x_{0}=0$,

Due to the straight line$l$With circle$x^{2}+y^{2}=\frac{1}{5}$tangent,$\frac{x_{0}}{\sqrt{1+4 x_{0}}}=\frac{1}{\sqrt{5}}$,

Square and sort out the two sides$5 x_{0}^{2}-4 x_{0}-1=0$, solve it$x_{0}=1, x_{0}=-\frac{1}{5}$(Abandon),

Then straight line$l$The equation of$x-2 y+1=0$, So $y=\frac{1}{2} x+\frac{1}{2}$.

So, the correct answer is: D.

question:
11. 设双曲线 $C: \frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1 \quad(a>0, b>0)$ 的左、右焦点分别为 $F_{1}, F_{2}$, 离心率为 $\sqrt{5} . P$ 是 $C$ 上一点, 且 $F_{1} P \perp F_{2} P$. 若 $\triangle P F_{1} F_{2}$ 的面积为 4 , 则 $a=(\quad)$
A. 1
B. 2
C. 4
D. 8
analysis:
【详解】 $\because \frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{5}, \therefore c=\sqrt{5} a$ ，根据双曲线的定义可得 ||$P F_{1}|-| P F_{2} \|=2 a$ ，

$S_{\triangle P F_{1} F_{2}}=\frac{1}{2}\left|P F_{1}\right| \cdot\left|P F_{2}\right|=4$, 即 $\left|P F_{1}\right| \cdot\left|P F_{2}\right|=8$ ，

$\because F_{1} P \perp F_{2} P, \quad \therefore\left|P F_{1}\right|^{2}+\left|P F_{2}\right|^{2}=(2 c)^{2}$

$\therefore\left(\left|P F_{1}\right|-\left|P F_{2}\right|\right)^{2}+2\left|P F_{1}\right| \cdot\left|P F_{2}\right|=4 c^{2}$, 即 $a^{2}-5 a^{2}+4=0$, 解得 $a=1$, 故选: A.

B. 2
C. 4
D. 8
analysis_en: 【Detailed explanation】$\because \frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{5}, \therefore c=\sqrt{5} a$, according to the definition of hyperbola ||$P F_{1}|-| P F_{2} \|=2 a$，$S_{\triangle P F_{1} F_{2}}=\frac{1}{2}\left|P F_{1}\right| \cdot\left|P F_{2}\right|=4$, So $\left|P F_{1}\right| \cdot\left|P F_{2}\right|=8$，$\because F_{1} P \perp F_{2} P, \quad \therefore\left|P F_{1}\right|^{2}+\left|P F_{2}\right|^{2}=(2 c)^{2}$$\therefore\left(\left|P F_{1}\right|-\left|P F_{2}\right|\right)^{2}+2\left|P F_{1}\right| \cdot\left|P F_{2}\right|=4 c^{2}$, So $a^{2}-5 a^{2}+4=0$, solve it$a=1$, so answer is: A.

question:
12. 已知 $5^{5}<8^{4}, 13^{4}<8^{5}$. 设 $a=\log _{5} 3, b=\log _{8} 5, c=\log _{13} 8$, 则 $(\quad)$
A. $a<b<c$
B. $b<a<c$
C. $b<c<a$
D. $c<a<b$
analysis:
【详 解 】 由 题 意 可 知 $a$ 、 $b$ 、 $c \in(0,1)$, $\frac{a}{b}=\frac{\log _{5} 3}{\log _{8} 5}=\frac{\lg 3}{\lg 5} \cdot \frac{\lg 8}{\lg 5}<\frac{1}{(\lg 5)^{2}} \cdot\left(\frac{\lg 3+\lg 8}{2}\right)^{2}=\left(\frac{\lg 3+\lg 8}{2 \lg 5}\right)^{2}=\left(\frac{\lg 24}{\lg 25}\right)^{2}<1, \quad \therefore a<b ;$ 由 $b=\log _{8} 5$, 得 $8^{b}=5$, 由 $5^{5}<8^{4}$, 得 $8^{5 b}<8^{4}, \therefore 5 b<4$, 可得 $b<\frac{4}{5}$; 由 $c=\log _{13} 8$, 得 $13^{c}=8$, 由 $13^{4}<8^{5}$, 得 $13^{4}<13^{5 c}, \therefore 5 c>4$, 可得 $c>\frac{4}{5}$. 综上所述, $a<b<c$.

故选: A.
analysis_en:
【Detailed explanation】 From the question, we can know$a$、$b$、$c \in(0,1)$,$\frac{a}{b}=\frac{\log _{5} 3}{\log _{8} 5}=\frac{\lg 3}{\lg 5} \cdot \frac{\lg 8}{\lg 5}<\frac{1}{(\lg 5)^{2}} \cdot\left(\frac{\lg 3+\lg 8}{2}\right)^{2}=\left(\frac{\lg 3+\lg 8}{2 \lg 5}\right)^{2}=\left(\frac{\lg 24}{\lg 25}\right)^{2}<1, \quad \therefore a<b ;$Depend on$b=\log _{8} 5$, have to$8^{b}=5$, Depend on$5^{5}<8^{4}$, have to$8^{5 b}<8^{4}, \therefore 5 b<4$, available$b<\frac{4}{5}$; Depend on$c=\log _{13} 8$, have to$13^{c}=8$, Depend on$13^{4}<8^{5}$, have to$13^{4}<13^{5 c}, \therefore 5 c>4$, available$c>\frac{4}{5}$. In summary,$a<b<c$.

So, the correct answer is: A.

question:
2. 设集合 $A=\left\{x \mid x^{2}-4 \leq 0\right\}, B=\{x \mid 2 x+a \leq 0\}$, 且 $A \cap B=\{x \mid-2 \leq x \leq 1\}$, 则 $a=(\quad)$

because$A \cap B=\{x \mid-2 \leq x \leq 1\}$, so:$-\frac{a}{2}=1$, Solution:$a=-2$.

question:
6. 函数 $f(x)=x^{4}-2 x^{3}$ 的图像在点 $(1, f(1))$ 处的切线方程为 ()
A. $y=-2 x-1$
B. $y=-2 x+1$
C. $y=2 x-3$
D. $y=2 x+1$
analysis:
【详解】 $\because f(x)=x^{4}-2 x^{3}, \therefore f^{\prime}(x)=4 x^{3}-6 x^{2}, \therefore f(1)=-1, f^{\prime}(1)=-2$,

因此, 所求切线的方程为 $y+1=-2(x-1)$, 即 $y=-2 x+1$.

故选: B.

analysis_en:

So, the equation of the tangent is$y+1=-2(x-1)$, So $y=-2 x+1$.

So, the correct answer is: B.

question:
11. 已知 $\odot M: x^{2}+y^{2}-2 x-2 y-2=0$, 直线 $l: 2 x+y+2=0, P$ 为 $l$ 上的动点, 过点 $P$ 作 $\odot M$ 的切 线 $P A, P B$, 切点为 $A, B$, 当 $|P M| \cdot|A B|$ 最小时, 直线 $A B$ 的方程为（ ()
A. $2 x-y-1=0$

analysis:
【详解】圆的方程可化为 $(x-1)^{2}+(y-1)^{2}=4$, 点 $M$ 到直线 $l$ 的距离为 $d=\frac{|2 \times 1+1+2|}{\sqrt{2^{2}+1^{2}}}=\sqrt{5}>2$ , 所以直线 $l$ 与圆相离.

$|P M| \cdot|A B|=2 S_{\triangle P A M}=2 \times \frac{1}{2} \times|P A| \times|A M|=2|P A|$, 而 $|P A|=\sqrt{|M P|^{2}-4}$ ，

$\therefore M P: y-1=\frac{1}{2}(x-1)$ 即 $y=\frac{1}{2} x+\frac{1}{2}$, 由 $\left\{\begin{array}{c}y=\frac{1}{2} x+\frac{1}{2} \\ 2 x+y+2=0\end{array}\right.$ 解得, $\left\{\begin{array}{l}x=-1 \\ y=0\end{array}\right.$.

所以以 $M P$ 为直径的圆的方程为 $(x-1)(x+1)+y(y-1)=0$, 即 $x^{2}+y^{2}-y-1=0$,

两圆的方程相减可得: $2 x+y+1=0$, 即为直线 $A B$ 的方程.

故选: D.

When straight line$M P \perp l$hour,$|M P|_{\min }=\sqrt{5},|P A|_{\min }=1$, at this time$|P M| \cdot|A B|$Minimum.$\therefore M P: y-1=\frac{1}{2}(x-1)$So $y=\frac{1}{2} x+\frac{1}{2}$, Depend on$\left\{\begin{array}{c}y=\frac{1}{2} x+\frac{1}{2} \\ 2 x+y+2=0\end{array}\right.$I understand,$\left\{\begin{array}{l}x=-1 \\ y=0\end{array}\right.$.

So$M P$The equation of the circle of diameter is$(x-1)(x+1)+y(y-1)=0$, So $x^{2}+y^{2}-y-1=0$,

Subtracting the equations of two circles can result in:$2 x+y+1=0$, that is, a straight line$A B$The equation of

So, the correct answer is: D.

question:
12.若 $2^{a}+\log _{2} a=4^{b}+2 \log _{4} b$ ，则（ $)$
A. $a>2 b$
B. $a<2 b$
C. $a>b^{2}$
D. $a<b^{2}$
analysis:
【详解】 设 $f(x)=2^{x}+\log _{2} x$, 则 $f(x)$ 为增函数, 因为 $2^{a}+\log _{2} a=4^{b}+2 \log _{4} b=2^{2 b}+\log _{2} b$

所以 $f(a)-f(2 b)=2^{a}+\log _{2} a-\left(2^{2 b}+\log _{2} 2 b\right)=2^{2 b}+\log _{2} b-\left(2^{2 b}+\log _{2} 2 b\right)=\log _{2} \frac{1}{2}=-1<0$,

所以 $f(a)<f(2 b)$, 所以 $a<2 b$.

$f(a)-f\left(b^{2}\right)=2^{a}+\log _{2} a-\left(2^{b^{2}}+\log _{2} b^{2}\right)=2^{2 b}+\log _{2} b-\left(2^{b^{2}}+\log _{2} b^{2}\right)=2^{2 b}-2^{b^{2}}-\log _{2} b$,

当 $b=1$ 时, $f(a)-f\left(b^{2}\right)=2>0$, 此时 $f(a)>f\left(b^{2}\right)$, 有 $a>b^{2}$

当 $b=2$ 时, $f(a)-f\left(b^{2}\right)=-1<0$, 此时 $f(a)<f\left(b^{2}\right)$, 有 $a<b^{2}$, 所以C、D错误.

故选: B.

【点晴】本题主要考查函数与方程的综合应用, 涉及到构造函数, 利用函数的单调性比较大小, 是一道中 档题.
analysis_en:
【Detailed explanation】Set$f(x)=2^{x}+\log _{2} x$, then $f(x)$To increase the function, because$2^{a}+\log _{2} a=4^{b}+2 \log _{4} b=2^{2 b}+\log _{2} b$so$f(a)-f(2 b)=2^{a}+\log _{2} a-\left(2^{2 b}+\log _{2} 2 b\right)=2^{2 b}+\log _{2} b-\left(2^{2 b}+\log _{2} 2 b\right)=\log _{2} \frac{1}{2}=-1<0$,

so$f(a)<f(2 b)$, so$a<2 b$.$f(a)-f\left(b^{2}\right)=2^{a}+\log _{2} a-\left(2^{b^{2}}+\log _{2} b^{2}\right)=2^{2 b}+\log _{2} b-\left(2^{b^{2}}+\log _{2} b^{2}\right)=2^{2 b}-2^{b^{2}}-\log _{2} b$,

when$b=1$hour,$f(a)-f\left(b^{2}\right)=2>0$, at this time$f(a)>f\left(b^{2}\right)$, have$a>b^{2}$when$b=2$hour,$f(a)-f\left(b^{2}\right)=-1<0$, at this time$f(a)<f\left(b^{2}\right)$, have$a<b^{2}$, so C and D are wrong.

So, the correct answer is: B.

question:
3.在新冠肺炎疫情防控期间, 某超市开通网上销售业务, 每天能完成1200份订单的配货, 由于订单量大幅 增加, 导致订单积压. 为解决困难, 许多志愿者踊跃报名参加配货工作. 已知该超市某日积压 500 份订单末配 货, 预计第二天的新订单超过 1600 份的概率为 0.05 , 志愿者每人每天能完成 50 份订单的配货, 为使第二天 完成积压订单及当日订单的配货的概率不小于 0.95 ，则至少需要志愿者（）
A. 10 名
B. 18 名
C. 24名
D. 32 名
analysis:
【详解】由题意, 第二天新增订单数为 $500+1600-1200=900$,

故需要志愿者 $\frac{900}{50}=18$ 名.

故选: B

【点晴】本题主要考查函数模型的简单应用, 属于基础题.

Due to the sharp increase in order volume, the order backlog was caused. In order to solve the difficulties, many volunteers enthusiastically signed up to participate in the delivery work. It is known that the supermarket had a backlog of 500 orders on a certain day. It is estimated that the probability of more than 1,600 new orders on the next day is 0.05. Each volunteer can complete the delivery of 50 orders per day. In order to ensure that the probability of completing the backlog order and the delivery of the same day is no less than 0.95, at least a volunteer is required ()

B. 18

So, volunteers are needed$\frac{900}{50}=18$name.

So, the correct answer is: B

question:
5. 若过点 $(2,1)$ 的圆与两坐标轴都相切, 则圆心到直线 $2 x-y-3=0$ 的距离为 $(\quad)$
A. $\frac{\sqrt{5}}{5}$
B. $\frac{2 \sqrt{5}}{5}$
C. $\frac{3 \sqrt{5}}{5}$
D. $\frac{4 \sqrt{5}}{5}$
analysis:
【详解】由于圆上的点 $(2,1)$ 在第一象限, 若圆心不在第一象限,

则圆与至少与一条坐标轴相交, 不合乎题意, 所以圆心必在第一象限,

设圆心的坐标为 $(a, a)$, 则圆的半径为 $a$,

圆的标准方程为 $(x-a)^{2}+(y-a)^{2}=a^{2}$. 由题意可得 $(2-a)^{2}+(1-a)^{2}=a^{2}$,

可得 $a^{2}-6 a+5=0$, 解得 $a=1$ 或 $a=5$,

所以圆心的坐标为 $(1,1)$ 或 $(5,5)$,

圆心到直线 $2 x-y-3=0$ 的距离均为 $d=\frac{|-2|}{\sqrt{5}}=\frac{2 \sqrt{5}}{5}$;

所以，圆心到直线 $2 x-y-3=0$ 的距离为 $\frac{2 \sqrt{5}}{5}$.

故选: B.

analysis_en:
【Detailed explanation】Because of the point on the circle$(2,1)$In the first quadrant, if the center of the circle is not in the first quadrant,

Then the circle intersects at least one coordinate axis, which does not fit the question, so the center of the circle must be in the first quadrant.

Suppose the coordinates of the center of the circle are$(a, a)$, then the radius of the circle is$a$,

The standard equation of a circle is$(x-a)^{2}+(y-a)^{2}=a^{2}$. It can be obtained from the question$(2-a)^{2}+(1-a)^{2}=a^{2}$,

So$a^{2}-6 a+5=0$, solve it$a=1$or$a=5$,

So the coordinates of the center of the circle are$(1,1)$or$(5,5)$,

The center of the circle to the straight line$2 x-y-3=0$The distances are$d=\frac{|-2|}{\sqrt{5}}=\frac{2 \sqrt{5}}{5}$;

So, the center of the circle reaches the straight line$2 x-y-3=0$The distance is$\frac{2 \sqrt{5}}{5}$.

So, the correct answer is: B.

question:
6. 数列 $\left\{a_{n}\right\}$ 中, $a_{1}=2, a_{m+n}=a_{m} a_{n}$, 若 $a_{k+1}+a_{k+2}+\cdots+a_{k+10}=2^{15}-2^{5}$, 则 $k=(\quad)$
A. 2
B. 3
C. 4
D. 5
analysis:
【详解】在等式 $a_{m+n}=a_{m} a_{n}$ 中, 令 $m=1$, 可得 $a_{n+1}=a_{n} a_{1}=2 a_{n}, \therefore \frac{a_{n+1}}{a_{n}}=2$,

所以, 数列 $\left\{a_{n}\right\}$ 是以 2 为首项, 以 2 为公比的等比数列, 则 $a_{n}=2 \times 2^{n-1}=2^{n}$,

$\therefore a_{k+1}+a_{k+2}+\cdots+a_{k+10}=\frac{a_{k+1} \cdot\left(1-2^{10}\right)}{1-2}=\frac{2^{k+1} \cdot\left(1-2^{10}\right)}{1-2}=2^{k+1}\left(2^{10}-1\right)=2^{5}\left(2^{10}-1\right)$,

$\therefore 2^{k+1}=2^{5}$, 则 $k+1=5$, 解得 $k=4$.

故选: C.
question_en:
6. Sequence$\left\{a_{n}\right\}$middle,$a_{1}=2, a_{m+n}=a_{m} a_{n}$, like$a_{k+1}+a_{k+2}+\cdots+a_{k+10}=2^{15}-2^{5}$, then $k=(\quad)$A. 2
B. 3
C. 4
D. 5
analysis_en:
【Detailed explanation】In the equation$a_{m+n}=a_{m} a_{n}$In,$m=1$, available$a_{n+1}=a_{n} a_{1}=2 a_{n}, \therefore \frac{a_{n+1}}{a_{n}}=2$,

So, the sequence$\left\{a_{n}\right\}$So, an equal ratio sequence with 2 as the first item and 2 as the common ratio,$a_{n}=2 \times 2^{n-1}=2^{n}$,$\therefore a_{k+1}+a_{k+2}+\cdots+a_{k+10}=\frac{a_{k+1} \cdot\left(1-2^{10}\right)}{1-2}=\frac{2^{k+1} \cdot\left(1-2^{10}\right)}{1-2}=2^{k+1}\left(2^{10}-1\right)=2^{5}\left(2^{10}-1\right)$,$\therefore 2^{k+1}=2^{5}$, then $k+1=5$, solve it$k=4$.

So, the correct answer is: C.

question:
8. 设 $O$ 为坐标原点, 直线 $x=a$ 与双曲线 $C: \frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$ 的两条渐近线分别交于 $D, E$ 两点, 若 $\square O D E$ 的面积为 8 , 则 $C$ 的焦距的最小值为（）
A. 4
B. 8
C. 16
D. 32
analysis:
【详解】 $\because C \frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$

$\therefore$ 双曲线的渐近线方程是 $y= \pm \frac{b}{a} x$

$\because$ 直线 $x=a$ 与双曲线 $C: \frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$ 的两条渐近线分别交于 $D, E$ 两点

不妨设 $D$ 为在第一象限, $E$ 在第四象限

联立 $\left\{\begin{array}{l}x=a \\ y=\frac{b}{a} x\end{array}\right.$, 解得 $\left\{\begin{array}{l}x=a \\ y=b\end{array}\right.$

故 $D(a, b)$

联立 $\left\{\begin{array}{l}x=a \\ y=-\frac{b}{a} x\end{array}\right.$, 解得 $\left\{\begin{array}{l}x=a \\ y=-b\end{array}\right.$

故 $E(a,-b)$

$\therefore|E D|=2 b$

$\therefore \square O D E$ 面积为: $S_{\triangle O D E}=\frac{1}{2} a \times 2 b=a b=8$

$\because$ 双曲线 $C: \frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$

$\therefore$ 其焦距为 $2 c=2 \sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}} \geq 2 \sqrt{2 a b}=2 \sqrt{16}=8$

当且仅当 $a=b=2 \sqrt{2}$ 取等号

$\therefore C$ 的焦距的最小值： 8

故选: B.

You may wish to set up$D$For in the first quadrant,$E$In the fourth quadrant

So, the correct answer is: B.

question:
9. 设函数 $f(x)=\ln |2 x+1-| \ln |2 x-1|$, 则 $f(x)(\quad)$
A. 是偶函数, 且在 $\left(\frac{1}{2},+\infty\right)$ 单调递增
B. 是奇函数, 且在 $\left(-\frac{1}{2}, \frac{1}{2}\right)$ 单调递减
C. 是偶函数, 且在 $\left(-\infty,-\frac{1}{2}\right)$ 单调递增
D. 是奇函数, 且在 $\left(-\infty,-\frac{1}{2}\right)$ 单调递减
analysis:
【详解】由 $f(x)=\ln |2 x+1|-\ln |2 x-1|$ 得 $f(x)$ 定义域为 $\left\{x \mid x \neq \pm \frac{1}{2}\right\}$, 关于坐标原点对称,

又 $f(-x)=\ln |1-2 x|-\ln |-2 x-1|=\ln |2 x-1|-\ln |2 x+1|=-f(x)$,

$\therefore f(x)$ 为定义域上的奇函数，可排除 $\mathrm{AC}$;

当 $x \in\left(-\frac{1}{2}, \frac{1}{2}\right)$ 时, $f(x)=\ln (2 x+1)-\ln (1-2 x)$,

$\mathrm{Q} y=\ln (2 x+1)$ 在 $\left(-\frac{1}{2}, \frac{1}{2}\right)$ 上单调递增, $y=\ln (1-2 x)$ 在 $\left(-\frac{1}{2}, \frac{1}{2}\right)$ 上单调递减,

$\therefore f(x)$ 在 $\left(-\frac{1}{2}, \frac{1}{2}\right)$ 上单调递增，排除 $\mathrm{B}$;

当 $x \in\left(-\infty,-\frac{1}{2}\right)$ 时, $f(x)=\ln (-2 x-1)-\ln (1-2 x)=\ln \frac{2 x+1}{2 x-1}=\ln \left(1+\frac{2}{2 x-1}\right)$,

$\because \mu=1+\frac{2}{2 x-1}$ 在 $\left(-\infty,-\frac{1}{2}\right)$ 上单调递减, $f(\mu)=\ln \mu$ 在定义域内单调递增,

根据复合函数单调性可知: $f(x)$ 在 $\left(-\infty,-\frac{1}{2}\right)$ 上单调递减, D正确. 故选: D.
question_en:
9. Suppose the function$f(x)=\ln |2 x+1-| \ln |2 x-1|$, then $f(x)(\quad)$A. is an even function, and$\left(\frac{1}{2},+\infty\right)$Monotonously increasing
B. is an odd function, and$\left(-\frac{1}{2}, \frac{1}{2}\right)$Monotonously decreasing
C. is an even function, and$\left(-\infty,-\frac{1}{2}\right)$Monotonously increasing
D. is an odd function, and$\left(-\infty,-\frac{1}{2}\right)$Monotonously decreasing

question:
10.已知 $\triangle A B C$ 是面积为 $\frac{9 \sqrt{3}}{4}$ 的等边三角形, 且其顶点都在球 $O$ 的球面上. 若球 $O$ 的表面积为 $16 \pi$, 则 $O$ 到平面 $A B C$ 的距离为（）
A. $\sqrt{3}$
B. $\frac{3}{2}$
C. 1
D. $\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}$
analysis:
【详解】设球 $O$ 的半径为 $R$, 则 $4 \pi R^{2}=16 \pi$, 解得: $R=2$.

设 $\square A B C$ 外接圆半径为 $r$, 边长为 $a$,

$\because \square A B C$ 是面积为 $\frac{9 \sqrt{3}}{4}$ 的等边三角形,

$\therefore \frac{1}{2} a^{2} \times \frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}=\frac{9 \sqrt{3}}{4}$, 解得: $a=3, \therefore r=\frac{2}{3} \times \sqrt{a^{2}-\frac{a^{2}}{4}}=\frac{2}{3} \times \sqrt{9-\frac{9}{4}}=\sqrt{3}$,

$\therefore$ 球心 $O$ 到平面 $A B C$ 的距离 $d=\sqrt{R^{2}-r^{2}}=\sqrt{4-3}=1$.

故选: C.
question_en:
10. Given$\triangle A B C$It is the area$\frac{9 \sqrt{3}}{4}$equilateral triangle, and its vertices are all on the ball$O$on the sphere.$O$The surface area is$16 \pi$, then $O$To the plane$A B C$The distance is ()
A.$\sqrt{3}$B.$\frac{3}{2}$C. 1
D.$\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}$
analysis_en:
【Detailed explanation】Set the ball$O$The radius of$R$, then $4 \pi R^{2}=16 \pi$, Solution:$R=2$.

set up$\square A B C$The radius of the circumference is$r$, the side length is$a$,$\because \square A B C$It is the area$\frac{9 \sqrt{3}}{4}$equilateral triangle,$\therefore \frac{1}{2} a^{2} \times \frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}=\frac{9 \sqrt{3}}{4}$, Solution:$a=3, \therefore r=\frac{2}{3} \times \sqrt{a^{2}-\frac{a^{2}}{4}}=\frac{2}{3} \times \sqrt{9-\frac{9}{4}}=\sqrt{3}$,$\therefore$Ball heart$O$To the plane$A B C$Distance$d=\sqrt{R^{2}-r^{2}}=\sqrt{4-3}=1$.

So, the correct answer is: C.

question:
11. 若 $2^{x}-2^{y}<3^{-x}-3^{-y}$, 则（）
A. $\ln (y-x+1)>0$
B. $\ln (y-x+1)<0$
C. $\ln |x-y|>0$
D. $\ln |x-y|<0$
analysis:
【详解】由 $2^{x}-2^{y}<3^{-x}-3^{-y}$ 得: $2^{x}-3^{-x}<2^{y}-3^{-y}$,

令 $f(t)=2^{t}-3^{-t}$,

$\because y=2^{x}$ 为 $R$ 上的增函数, $y=3^{-x}$ 为 $R$ 上的减函数, $\therefore f(t)$ 为 $R$ 上的增函数,

$\therefore x<y$,

$\mathrm{Q} y-x>0, \therefore y-x+1>1, \therefore \ln (y-x+1)>0$, 则A正确, B错误;

$\mathrm{Q}|x-y|$ 与 1 的大小不确定，故 $\mathrm{CD}$ 无法确定.

故选: A.
analysis_en:
【Detailed explanation】B$2^{x}-2^{y}<3^{-x}-3^{-y}$have to:$2^{x}-3^{-x}<2^{y}-3^{-y}$,

make$f(t)=2^{t}-3^{-t}$,$\because y=2^{x}$for$R$the increment function on$y=3^{-x}$for$R$subtraction function on$\therefore f(t)$for$R$the increment function on$\therefore x<y$,$\mathrm{Q} y-x>0, \therefore y-x+1>1, \therefore \ln (y-x+1)>0$, then A is correct and B is wrong;$\mathrm{Q}|x-y|$The size of 1 is uncertain, so$\mathrm{CD}$Unable to be sure.

So, the correct answer is: A.

question:
12.0-1周期序列在通信技术中有着重要应用. 若序列 $a_{1} a_{2} \cdots a_{n} \cdots$ 满足 $a_{i} \in\{0,1\}(i=1,2, \cdots)$, 且存在正整数 $m$ , 使得 $a_{i+m}=a_{i}(i=1,2, \cdots)$ 成立, 则称其为 $0-1$ 周期序列, 并称满足 $a_{i+m}=a_{i}(i=1,2, \cdots)$ 的最小正整数 $m$ 为这个序列的周期.对于周期为 $m$ 的 $0-1$ 序列 $a_{1} a_{2} \cdots a_{n} \cdots, C(k)=\frac{1}{m} \sum_{i=1}^{m} a_{i} a_{i+k}(k=1,2, \cdots, m-1)$ 是描述其性质的重要指标, 下列周期为 5 的 $0-1$ 序列中， 满足 $C(k) \leq \frac{1}{5}(k=1,2,3,4)$ 的序列是 $(\quad)$
A. $11010 \cdots$
B. $11011 \cdots$
C. $10001 \cdots$
D. $11001 \cdots$
question_en: 12.0-1 cycle sequences have important applications in communication technology. If sequences$a_{1} a_{2} \cdots a_{n} \cdots$satisfy$a_{i} \in\{0,1\}(i=1,2, \cdots)$, and there are positive integers$m$, make$a_{i+m}=a_{i}(i=1,2, \cdots)$If it is established, it is called$0-1$Periodic sequence, and satisfy$a_{i+m}=a_{i}(i=1,2, \cdots)$The smallest positive integer$m$For the period of this sequence,$m$of$0-1$sequence$a_{1} a_{2} \cdots a_{n} \cdots, C(k)=\frac{1}{m} \sum_{i=1}^{m} a_{i} a_{i+k}(k=1,2, \cdots, m-1)$It is an important indicator to describe its nature, with the following cycles of 5$0-1$In the sequence, satisfy$C(k) \leq \frac{1}{5}(k=1,2,3,4)$The sequence is$(\quad)$A.$11010 \cdots$B.$11011 \cdots$C.$10001 \cdots$D.$11001 \cdots$

question:
1. 设集合 $M=\{x \mid 0<x<4\}, N=\left\{x \mid \frac{1}{3} \leq x \leq 5\right\}$, 则 $M \cap N=($,
A. $\left\{x \mid 0<x \leq \frac{1}{3}\right\}$
B. $\left\{x \mid \frac{1}{3} \leq x<4\right\}$
C. $\{x \mid 4 \leq x<5\}$
D. $\{x \mid 0<x \leq 5\}$
analysis:
【详解】因为 $M=\{x \mid 0<x<4\}, N=\left\{x \mid \frac{1}{3} \leq x \leq 5\right\}$, 所以 $M \cap N=\left\{x \mid \frac{1}{3} \leq x<4\right\}$,

故选: B.
question_en:
1. Set a collection$M=\{x \mid 0<x<4\}, N=\left\{x \mid \frac{1}{3} \leq x \leq 5\right\}$, then $M \cap N=($,
A.$\left\{x \mid 0<x \leq \frac{1}{3}\right\}$B.$\left\{x \mid \frac{1}{3} \leq x<4\right\}$C.$\{x \mid 4 \leq x<5\}$D.$\{x \mid 0<x \leq 5\}$
analysis_en:
【Detailed explanation】Because$M=\{x \mid 0<x<4\}, N=\left\{x \mid \frac{1}{3} \leq x \leq 5\right\}$, so$M \cap N=\left\{x \mid \frac{1}{3} \leq x<4\right\}$,

So, the correct answer is: B.

question:
3. 已知 $(1-i)^{2} z=3+2 i$, 则 $z=(\quad)$
A. $-1-\frac{3}{2} i$
B. $-1+\frac{3}{2} i$
C. $-\frac{3}{2}+i$
D. $-\frac{3}{2}-i$
analysis_en:
【Detailed explanation】$(1-i)^{2} z=-2 i z=3+2 i$,$z=\frac{3+2 i}{-2 i}=\frac{(3+2 i) \cdot i}{-2 i \cdot i}=\frac{-2+3 i}{2}=-1+\frac{3}{2} i$.

So, the correct answer is: B.

question:
4. 青少年视力是社会普遍关注的问题, 视力情况可借助视力表测量. 通常用五分记录法和小数记录法记录 视力数据, 五分记录法的数据 $L$ 和小数记录表的数据 $V$ 的满足 $L=5+\lg V$. 已知某同学视力的五分记录法 的数据为 4.9 , 则其视力的小数记录法的数据为 $(\quad) \quad(\sqrt[10]{10} \approx 1.259)$
A. 1.5
B. 1.2
C. 0.8
D. 0.6
question_en:
4. Adolescent vision is a common concern for society, and vision can be measured with the help of the vision table. The five-point recording method and the decimal recording method are usually recorded. The five-point recording method is used to record the vision data and the five-point recording method.$L$and decimal record table data$V$Satisfaction$L=5+\lg V$. It is known that the data of the five-point recording method for a student's vision is 4.9, and the data of the decimal recording method for his vision is$(\quad) \quad(\sqrt[10]{10} \approx 1.259)$A. 1.5
B. 1.2
C. 0.8
D. 0.6
analysis_en:
【Detailed explanation】B$L=5+\lg V$, when$L=4.9$hour,$\lg V=-0.1$, then $V=10^{-0.1}=10^{-\frac{1}{10}}=\frac{1}{\sqrt[10]{10}} \approx \frac{1}{1.259} \approx 0.8$.

So, the correct answer is: C.

question:
5. 已知 $F_{1}, F_{2}$ 是双曲线 $C$ 的两个焦点, $P$ 为 $C$ 上一点, 且 $\angle F_{1} P F_{2}=60^{\circ},\left|P F_{1}\right|=3\left|P F_{2}\right|$, 则 $C$ 的离心率为
A. $\frac{\sqrt{7}}{2}$
B. $\frac{\sqrt{13}}{2}$
C. $\sqrt{7}$
D. $\sqrt{13}$
analysis:
【详解】因为 $\left|P F_{1}\right|=3\left|P F_{2}\right|$, 由双曲线的定义可得 $\left|P F_{1}\right|-\left|P F_{2}\right|=2\left|P F_{2}\right|=2 a$,

所以 $\left|P F_{2}\right|=a,\left|P F_{1}\right|=3 a$;

因为 $\angle F_{1} P F_{2}=60^{\circ}$,由余弦定理可得 $4 c^{2}=9 a^{2}+a^{2}-2 \times 3 a \cdot a \cdot \cos 60^{\circ}$,

整理可得 $4 c^{2}=7 a^{2}$, 所以 $e^{2}=\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{7}{4}$, 即 $e=\frac{\sqrt{7}}{2}$.

故选: A
question_en:
5. Given$F_{1}, F_{2}$It's a hyperbolic$C$The two focus points,$P$for$C$A little bit, and$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}=60^{\circ},\left|P F_{1}\right|=3\left|P F_{2}\right|$, then $C$The eccentricity rate is
A.$\frac{\sqrt{7}}{2}$B.$\frac{\sqrt{13}}{2}$C.$\sqrt{7}$D.$\sqrt{13}$
analysis_en:
【Detailed explanation】Because$\left|P F_{1}\right|=3\left|P F_{2}\right|$, can be obtained by the definition of hyperbola$\left|P F_{1}\right|-\left|P F_{2}\right|=2\left|P F_{2}\right|=2 a$,

so$\left|P F_{2}\right|=a,\left|P F_{1}\right|=3 a$;

because$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}=60^{\circ}$, from the cosine theorem$4 c^{2}=9 a^{2}+a^{2}-2 \times 3 a \cdot a \cdot \cos 60^{\circ}$,

So for sorting$4 c^{2}=7 a^{2}$, so$e^{2}=\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{7}{4}$, So $e=\frac{\sqrt{7}}{2}$.

So, the correct answer is: A

question:
7. 等比数列 $\left\{a_{n}\right\}$ 的公比为 $q$, 前 $n$ 项和为 $S_{n}$, 设甲: $q>0$, 乙: $\left\{S_{n}\right\}$ 是递增数列, 则 ( )
A. 甲是乙的充分条件但不是必要条件
B. 甲是乙的必要条件但不是充分条件
C. 甲是乙的充要条件
D. 甲既不是乙的充分条件也不是乙的必要条件
analysis:
【详解】由题, 当数列为 $-2,-4,-8, \cdots$ 时, 满足 $q>0$,

但是 $\left\{S_{n}\right\}$ 不是递增数列, 所以甲不是乙的充分条件.

若 $\left\{S_{n}\right\}$ 是递增数列, 则必有 $a_{n}>0$ 成立, 若 $q>0$ 不成立, 则会出现一正一负的情况，是矛盾的, 则 $q>0$ 成立, 所以甲是乙的必要条件.

故选: B.
question_en:
7. Equal ratio sequence$\left\{a_{n}\right\}$The common ratio is$q$, forward$n$Items and as$S_{n}$, Let A:$q>0$, Second:$\left\{S_{n}\right\}$is an incremental sequence, then ( )
A. A is a sufficient condition for B but not a necessary condition
B. A is a necessary but not a sufficient condition for B
C. A is the necessary and sufficient condition for B
D. A is neither a sufficient condition for B nor a necessary condition for B
analysis_en:
【Detailed explanation】By the question, when the sequence is$-2,-4,-8, \cdots$When satisfied$q>0$,

then $\left\{S_{n}\right\}$It is not an incrementing sequence, so A is not a sufficient condition for B.

like$\left\{S_{n}\right\}$It is an incremental sequence, then there must be$a_{n}>0$It is established, young$q>0$If it is not true, there will be a positive and negative situation, which is contradictory,$q>0$It is true, so A is a necessary condition for B.

So, the correct answer is: B.

question:
9. 若 $a \in\left(0, \frac{\pi}{2}\right), \tan 2 a=\frac{\cos a}{2-\sin a}$, 则 $\tan a=(\quad)$
A. $\frac{\sqrt{15}}{15}$
B. $\frac{\sqrt{5}}{5}$
C. $\frac{\sqrt{5}}{3}$
D. $\frac{\sqrt{15}}{3}$
analysis:
【详解】 $\because \tan 2 a=\frac{\cos a}{2-\sin a}$

$\therefore \tan 2 a=\frac{\sin 2 a}{\cos 2 a}=\frac{2 \sin a \cos a}{1-2 \sin ^{2} a}=\frac{\cos a}{2-\sin a}$,

$\because a \in\left(0, \frac{\pi}{2}\right), \therefore \cos a \neq 0, \therefore \frac{2 \sin a}{1-2 \sin ^{2} a}=\frac{1}{2-\sin a}$, 解得 $\sin a=\frac{1}{4}$,

$\therefore \cos a=\sqrt{1-\sin ^{2} a}=\frac{\sqrt{15}}{4}, \quad \therefore \tan a=\frac{\sin a}{\cos a}=\frac{\sqrt{15}}{15}$.

故选: A.
question_en: 9. If$a \in\left(0, \frac{\pi}{2}\right), \tan 2 a=\frac{\cos a}{2-\sin a}$, then $\tan a=(\quad)$A.$\frac{\sqrt{15}}{15}$B.$\frac{\sqrt{5}}{5}$C.$\frac{\sqrt{5}}{3}$D.$\frac{\sqrt{15}}{3}$
analysis_en:
【Detailed explanation】$\because \tan 2 a=\frac{\cos a}{2-\sin a}$$\therefore \tan 2 a=\frac{\sin 2 a}{\cos 2 a}=\frac{2 \sin a \cos a}{1-2 \sin ^{2} a}=\frac{\cos a}{2-\sin a}$,$\because a \in\left(0, \frac{\pi}{2}\right), \therefore \cos a \neq 0, \therefore \frac{2 \sin a}{1-2 \sin ^{2} a}=\frac{1}{2-\sin a}$, solve it$\sin a=\frac{1}{4}$,$\therefore \cos a=\sqrt{1-\sin ^{2} a}=\frac{\sqrt{15}}{4}, \quad \therefore \tan a=\frac{\sin a}{\cos a}=\frac{\sqrt{15}}{15}$.

So, the correct answer is: A.

question:
10. 将 4 个 1 和 2 个 0 随机排成一行, 则 2 个 0 不相邻的概率为 $(\quad)$ 
A. $\frac{1}{3}$
B. $\frac{2}{5}$
C. $\frac{2}{3}$
D. $\frac{4}{5}$
analysis:
【详解】将 4 个 1 和 2 个 0 随机排成一行, 可利用揷空法, 4 个 1 产生 5 个空,

若 2 个 0 相邻, 则有 $C_{5}^{1}=5$ 种排法, 若 2 个 0 不相邻, 则有 $C_{5}^{2}=10$ 种排法,

所以 2 个 0 不相邻的概率为 $\frac{10}{5+10}=\frac{2}{3}$.

故选: C.
question_en: 10. Randomly line 4 1s and 2 0s, then the probability that the 2 0s are not adjacent is$(\quad)$A.$\frac{1}{3}$B.$\frac{2}{5}$C.$\frac{2}{3}$D.$\frac{4}{5}$
analysis_en:
【Detailed explanation】Arrange 4 1s and 2 0s in a row randomly, and you can use the empty method to generate 5 empty spaces in 4 1s.

If 2 0 are adjacent, there is$C_{5}^{1}=5$If 2 0 are not adjacent, then$C_{5}^{2}=10$sorting method,

So, the probability that 2 0s are not adjacent is$\frac{10}{5+10}=\frac{2}{3}$.

So, the correct answer is: C.

question:
11. 已如 $A, B, C$ 是半径为 1 的球 $O$ 的球面上的三个点, 且 $A C \perp B C, A C=B C=1$, 则三棱雉 $O-A B C$ 的体积为 $(\quad)$
A. $\frac{\sqrt{2}}{12}$
B. $\frac{\sqrt{3}}{12}$
C. $\frac{\sqrt{2}}{4}$
D. $\frac{\sqrt{3}}{4}$
analysis:
【详解】 $\because A C \perp B C, A C=B C=1, \therefore \triangle A B C$ 为等腰直角三角形, $\therefore A B=\sqrt{2}$,

则 $\triangle A B C$ 外接圆的半径为 $\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}$, 又球的半径为 1 ,

设 $O$ 到平面 $A B C$ 的距离为 $d$,

则 $d=\sqrt{1^{2}-\left(\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}\right)^{2}}=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}$,

所以 $V_{O-A B C}=\frac{1}{3} S_{\triangle A B C} \cdot d=\frac{1}{3} \times \frac{1}{2} \times 1 \times 1 \times \frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{12}$.

故选: A.
question_en: 11. Already$A, B, C$It is a ball with a radius of 1$O$three points on the sphere, and$A C \perp B C, A C=B C=1$, then the triangular pheasant$O-A B C$The volume of$(\quad)$A.$\frac{\sqrt{2}}{12}$B.$\frac{\sqrt{3}}{12}$C.$\frac{\sqrt{2}}{4}$D.$\frac{\sqrt{3}}{4}$
analysis_en:
【Detailed explanation】$\because A C \perp B C, A C=B C=1, \therefore \triangle A B C$isosceles right triangle,$\therefore A B=\sqrt{2}$,

then $\triangle A B C$The radius of the circumference is$\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}$, and the radius of the ball is 1,

set up$O$To the plane$A B C$The distance is$d$,

then $d=\sqrt{1^{2}-\left(\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}\right)^{2}}=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}$,

so$V_{O-A B C}=\frac{1}{3} S_{\triangle A B C} \cdot d=\frac{1}{3} \times \frac{1}{2} \times 1 \times 1 \times \frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{12}$.

So, the correct answer is: A.

question:
12. 设函数 $f(x)$ 的定义域为 $\mathbf{R}, f(x+1)$ 为奇函数, $f(x+2)$ 为偶函数, 当 $x \in[1,2]$ 时, $f(x)=a x^{2}+b$. 若 $f(0)+f(3)=6$, 则 $f\left(\frac{9}{2}\right)=(\quad)$
A. $-\frac{9}{4}$
B. $-\frac{3}{2}$
C. $\frac{7}{4}$
D. $\frac{5}{2}$
analysis:
【详解】因为 $f(x+1)$ 是奇函数, 所以 $f(-x+1)=-f(x+1)$ (1);

因为 $f(x+2)$ 是偶函数, 所以 $f(x+2)=f(-x+2)(2)$.

令 $x=1$, 由(1)得: $f(0)=-f(2)=-(4 a+b)$, 由(2)得： $f(3)=f(1)=a+b$,

因为 $f(0)+f(3)=6$, 所以 $-(4 a+b)+a+b=6 \Rightarrow a=-2$,

令 $x=0$, 由(1)得: $f(1)=-f(1) \Rightarrow f(1)=0 \Rightarrow b=2$, 所以 $f(x)=-2 x^{2}+2$.

思路一: 从定义人手.

$f\left(\frac{9}{2}\right)=f\left(\frac{5}{2}+2\right)=f\left(-\frac{5}{2}+2\right)=f\left(-\frac{1}{2}\right)$

$f\left(-\frac{1}{2}\right)=f\left(-\frac{3}{2}+1\right)=-f\left(\frac{3}{2}+1\right)=-f\left(\frac{5}{2}\right)$

$-f\left(\frac{5}{2}\right)=-f\left(\frac{1}{2}+2\right)=-f\left(-\frac{1}{2}+2\right)=-f\left(\frac{3}{2}\right)$

所以 $f\left(\frac{9}{2}\right)=-f\left(\frac{3}{2}\right)=\frac{5}{2}$.

思路二: 从周期性人手

由两个对称性可知, 函数 $f(x)$ 的周期 $T=4$.

所以 $f\left(\frac{9}{2}\right)=f\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)=-f\left(\frac{3}{2}\right)=\frac{5}{2}$.

故选: D.
question_en: 12. Suppose the function$f(x)$The domain of definition is$\mathbf{R}, f(x+1)$An odd function,$f(x+2)$is an even function, when$x \in[1,2]$hour,$f(x)=a x^{2}+b$. like$f(0)+f(3)=6$, then $f\left(\frac{9}{2}\right)=(\quad)$A.$-\frac{9}{4}$B.$-\frac{3}{2}$C.$\frac{7}{4}$D.$\frac{5}{2}$
analysis_en:
【Detailed explanation】Because$f(x+1)$It's an odd function, so$f(-x+1)=-f(x+1)$(1);

because$f(x+2)$It's an even function, so$f(x+2)=f(-x+2)(2)$.

make$x=1$, From (1):$f(0)=-f(2)=-(4 a+b)$, From (2):$f(3)=f(1)=a+b$,

because$f(0)+f(3)=6$, so$-(4 a+b)+a+b=6 \Rightarrow a=-2$,

make$x=0$, From (1):$f(1)=-f(1) \Rightarrow f(1)=0 \Rightarrow b=2$, so$f(x)=-2 x^{2}+2$.

Idea 1: Define the manpower.$f\left(\frac{9}{2}\right)=f\left(\frac{5}{2}+2\right)=f\left(-\frac{5}{2}+2\right)=f\left(-\frac{1}{2}\right)$$f\left(-\frac{1}{2}\right)=f\left(-\frac{3}{2}+1\right)=-f\left(\frac{3}{2}+1\right)=-f\left(\frac{5}{2}\right)$$-f\left(\frac{5}{2}\right)=-f\left(\frac{1}{2}+2\right)=-f\left(-\frac{1}{2}+2\right)=-f\left(\frac{3}{2}\right)$so$f\left(\frac{9}{2}\right)=-f\left(\frac{3}{2}\right)=\frac{5}{2}$.

Idea 2: From the periodic hand

From two symmetry, the function$f(x)$Cycles of$T=4$.

so$f\left(\frac{9}{2}\right)=f\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)=-f\left(\frac{3}{2}\right)=\frac{5}{2}$.

So, the correct answer is: D.

question:
1.设 $2(z+\bar{z})+3(z-\bar{z})=4+6 i$ ，则 $z=(\quad)$

A. $1-2 i$

B. $1+2 i$

C. $1+i$

D. $1-i$
analysis:
解析:

设 $z=a+b i$, 则 $\bar{z}=a-b i, 2(z+\bar{z})+3(z-\bar{z})=4 a+6 b i=4+6 i$, 所以 $a=1, b=1$,

所以 $z=1+i$.
analysis_en:
Analysis:

set up$z=a+b i$, then $\bar{z}=a-b i, 2(z+\bar{z})+3(z-\bar{z})=4 a+6 b i=4+6 i$, so$a=1, b=1$,

so$z=1+i$.

question:

A. $\varnothing$

$s=2 n+1, \quad n \in Z$

question:
3. 已知命题 $p: \exists x \in R, \sin x<1$; 命题 $q: \forall x \in R, e^{|x|} \geq 1$, 则下列命题中为真命题的是 
A. $p \wedge q$
B. $\neg p \wedge q$
C. $p \wedge \neg q$
D. $\neg(p \vee q)$
analysis:
解析:

根据正弦函数的值域 $\sin x \in[-1,1]$, 故 $\exists x \in R, \sin x<1, p$ 为真命题, 而函数 $y=y=e^{|x|}$ 为偶函数, 且 $x \geq 0$ 时, $y=e^{|x|} \geq 1$, 故 $\forall x \in R, y=e^{|x|} \geq 1$ 恒成立., 则 $q$ 也为真命题, 所 以 $p \wedge q$ 为真, 选 $\mathrm{A}$.
question_en:

A.$p \wedge q$B.$
eg p \wedge q$C.$p \wedge 
eg q$D.$
eg(p \vee q)$
analysis_en:
Analysis:

According to the value range of the sine function$\sin x \in[-1,1]$, therefore$\exists x \in R, \sin x<1, p$For the true proposition, the function$y=y=e^{|x|}$is an even function, and$x \geq 0$hour,$y=e^{|x|} \geq 1$, therefore$\forall x \in R, y=e^{|x|} \geq 1$Constantly established.,$q$It is also a true proposition, so$p \wedge q$True, choose$\mathrm{A}$.

question:

question:

question:
12. 设 $a=2 \ln 1.01, b=\ln 1.02, c=\sqrt{1.04}-1$, 则 $($ )
A. $a<b<c$
B. $b<c<a$
C. $b<a<c$
D. $c<a<b$
analysis_en:
Analysis:

set up$f(x)=\ln (1+x)-\sqrt{1+2 x}+1$, then $b-c=f(0.02)$, easy to get$f^{\prime}(x)=\frac{1}{1+x}-\frac{2}{2 \sqrt{1+2 x}}=\frac{\sqrt{1+2 x}-(1+x)}{(1+x) \sqrt{1+2 x}}$.

when$x \geq 0$hour,$1+x=\sqrt{(1+x)^{2}} \geq \sqrt{1+2 x}$, therefore$f^{\prime}(x) \leq 0$.

so$f(x)$exist$[0,+\infty)$monotonically decreasing, so$f(0.02)<f(0)=0$, therefore$b<c$.

Set again$g(x)=2 \ln (1+x)-\sqrt{1+4 x}+1$, then $a-c=g(0.01)$, Easy to get$g^{\prime}(x)=\frac{2}{1+x}-\frac{4}{2 \sqrt{1+4 x}}=2 \cdot \frac{\sqrt{1+4 x}-(1-x)}{(1+x) \sqrt{1+4 x}}$.

when$0 \leq x<2$hour,$\sqrt{1+4 x} \geq \sqrt{1+2 x+x^{2}}=1+x$, so$g^{\prime}(x)$exist$[0.2)$superior$\geq 0$.

So$g(x)$exist$[0.2)$monotonically increasing, so$g(0.01)>g(0)=0$, therefore$a>c$.

To sum up,$a>c>b$.

question:
2. 已知 $z=1-2 i$ ，且 $z+a \bar{z}+b=0$ ，其中 $a, b$ 为实数，则（)
A. $a=1, b=-2$
B. $a=-1, b=2$
C. $a=1, b=2$
D.

$a=-1, b=-2$
analysis:
【详解】 $\bar{z}=1+2 \mathrm{i}$

$z+a \bar{z}+b=1-2 \mathrm{i}+a(1+2 \mathrm{i})+b=(1+a+b)+(2 a-2) \mathrm{i}$

由 $z+a \bar{z}+b=0$, 得 $\left\{\begin{array}{l}1+a+b=0 \\ 2 a-2=0\end{array}\right.$,即 $\left\{\begin{array}{l}a=1 \\ b=-2\end{array}\right.$

故选: A

question:

A. -2
B. -1
C. 1
D. 2
analysis:
【详解】解: $\because|\vec{a}-2 \vec{b}|^{2}=|\vec{a}|^{2}-4 \vec{a} \cdot \vec{b}+4|\vec{b}|^{2}$,

又 $\because|\vec{a}|=1,|\vec{b}|=\sqrt{3},|\vec{a}-2 \vec{b}|=3$,

$\therefore 9=1-4 \vec{a} \cdot \vec{b}+4 \times 3=13-4 \vec{a} \cdot \vec{b}$

$\therefore \vec{a} \cdot \vec{b}=1$

故选: C.

question:
8. 已知等比数列 $\left\{a_{n}\right\}$ 的前 3 项和为 $168, a_{2}-a_{5}=42$, 则 $a_{6}=()$
A. 14
B. 12
C. 6
D. 3
analysis:
【详解】解：设等比数列 $\left\{a_{n}\right\}$ 的公比为 $q, q \neq 0$,

若 $q=1$, 则 $a_{2}-a_{5}=0$, 与题意矛盾,

所以 $q \neq 1$,

则 $\left\{\begin{array}{l}a_{1}+a_{2}+a_{3}=\frac{a_{1}\left(1-q^{3}\right)}{1-q} \\ a_{2}-a_{5}=a_{1} q-a_{1} q^{4}=42\end{array}\right.$, 解得 $\left\{\begin{array}{l}a_{1}=96 \\ q=\frac{1}{2}\end{array}\right.$,

所以 $a_{6}=a_{1} q^{5}=3$.

故选：D.
question_en:
8. Given equal ratio sequences$\left\{a_{n}\right\}$The first 3 items are$168, a_{2}-a_{5}=42$, then $a_{6}=()$A. 14
B. 12
C. 6
D. 3
analysis_en:
【Detailed explanation】Solve: Suppose the equal-scale sequence$\left\{a_{n}\right\}$The common ratio is$q, q \neq 0$,

like$q=1$, then $a_{2}-a_{5}=0$, Contradicting the meaning of the question,

so$q \neq 1$,

then $\left\{\begin{array}{l}a_{1}+a_{2}+a_{3}=\frac{a_{1}\left(1-q^{3}\right)}{1-q} \\ a_{2}-a_{5}=a_{1} q-a_{1} q^{4}=42\end{array}\right.$, solve it$\left\{\begin{array}{l}a_{1}=96 \\ q=\frac{1}{2}\end{array}\right.$,

so$a_{6}=a_{1} q^{5}=3$.

So, the correct answer is: D.

question:
9. 已知球 $O$ 的半径为 1 , 四棱雉的顶点为 $O$, 底面的四个顶点均在球 $O$ 的球面上, 则当该 四棱雉的体积最大时，其高为（）
A. $\frac{1}{3}$
B. $\frac{1}{2}$
C. $\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}$
D. $\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}$
analysis:
【详解】设该四棱雉底面为四边形 $A B C D$, 四边形 $A B C D$ 所在小圆半径为 $r$,

设四边形 $A B C D$ 对角线夹角为 $a$,

则 $S_{A B C D}=\frac{1}{2} \cdot A C \cdot B D \cdot \sin a \leq \frac{1}{2} \cdot A C \cdot B D \leq \frac{1}{2} \cdot 2 r \cdot 2 r=2 r^{2}$

(当且仅当四边形 $A B C D$ 为正方形时等号成立)

即当四棱雉的顶点 $O$ 到底面 $A B C D$ 所在小圆距离一定时, 底面 $A B C D$ 面积最大值为 $2 r^{2}$

又 $r^{2}+h^{2}=1$

则 $V_{O-A B C D}=\frac{1}{3} \cdot 2 r^{2} \cdot h=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{3} \sqrt{r^{2} \cdot r^{2} \cdot 2 h^{2}} \leq \frac{\sqrt{2}}{3} \sqrt{\left(\frac{r^{2}+r^{2}+2 h^{2}}{3}\right)^{3}}=\frac{4 \sqrt{3}}{27}$

当且仅当 $r^{2}=2 h^{2}$ 即 $h=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}$ 时等号成立,

故选: C
question_en:
9. Given ball$O$The radius is 1, and the vertex of the four-ringed pheasant is$O$, all four vertices on the bottom are on the ball$O$On the spherical surface, when the volume of the four-ringed pheasant is the largest, its height is ()
A.$\frac{1}{3}$B.$\frac{1}{2}$C.$\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}$D.$\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}$
analysis_en:
【Detailed explanation】Suppose the bottom surface of the four-sided pheasant is a quadrilateral shape$A B C D$, Quadrilateral$A B C D$The radius of the small circle is$r$,

Set a quadrilateral$A B C D$The diagonal angle is$a$,

then $S_{A B C D}=\frac{1}{2} \cdot A C \cdot B D \cdot \sin a \leq \frac{1}{2} \cdot A C \cdot B D \leq \frac{1}{2} \cdot 2 r \cdot 2 r=2 r^{2}$(if and only if quadrilateral$A B C D$When it is a square, the equal sign holds true)

That is, as the vertex of the four-edged pheasant$O$To the bottom$A B C D$When the distance between the small circle is constant, the bottom surface$A B C D$The maximum area is$2 r^{2}$again$r^{2}+h^{2}=1$then $V_{O-A B C D}=\frac{1}{3} \cdot 2 r^{2} \cdot h=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{3} \sqrt{r^{2} \cdot r^{2} \cdot 2 h^{2}} \leq \frac{\sqrt{2}}{3} \sqrt{\left(\frac{r^{2}+r^{2}+2 h^{2}}{3}\right)^{3}}=\frac{4 \sqrt{3}}{27}$If and only$r^{2}=2 h^{2}$So $h=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}$The equal sign holds,

So, the correct answer is: C

question:
10. 某棋手与甲、乙、丙三位棋手各比赛一盘, 各盘比赛结果相互独立. 已知该棋手与甲、 乙、丙比赛获胜的概率分别为 $p_{1}, p_{2}, p_{3}$, 且 $p_{3}>p_{2}>p_{1}>0$. 记该棋手连胜两盘的概率为 $p$, 则 ()
A. $p$ 与该棋手和甲、乙、丙的比赛次序无关
B. 该棋手在第二盘与甲比赛， $p$ 最大
C. 该棋手在第二盘与乙比赛, $p$ 最大
D. 该棋手在第二盘与丙比赛, $p$ 最大
analysis:
【详解】该棋手连胜两盘, 则第二盘为必胜盘,

记该棋手在第二盘与甲比赛，且连胜两盘的概率为 $p_{\text {甲 }}$

则 $p_{\text {甲 }}=2\left(1-p_{2}\right) p_{1} p_{3}+2 p_{2} p_{1}\left(1-p_{3}\right)=2 p_{1}\left(p_{2}+p_{3}\right)-4 p_{1} p_{2} p_{3}$ 记该棋手在第二盘与乙比赛, 且连胜两盘的概率为 $p_{\text {乙 }}$

则 $p_{\text {乙 }}=2\left(1-p_{1}\right) p_{2} p_{3}+2 p_{1} p_{2}\left(1-p_{3}\right)=2 p_{2}\left(p_{1}+p_{3}\right)-4 p_{1} p_{2} p_{3}$

记该棋手在第二盘与丙比赛, 且连胜两盘的概率为 $p_{\text {丙 }}$

则 $p_{\text {丙 }}=2\left(1-p_{1}\right) p_{3} p_{2}+2 p_{1} p_{3}\left(1-p_{2}\right)=2 p_{3}\left(p_{1}+p_{2}\right)-4 p_{1} p_{2} p_{3}$

则 $p_{\text {甲 }}-p_{\text {乙 }}=2 p_{1}\left(p_{2}+p_{3}\right)-4 p_{1} p_{2} p_{3}-\left[2 p_{2}\left(p_{1}+p_{3}\right)-4 p_{1} p_{2} p_{3}\right]=2\left(p_{1}-p_{2}\right) p_{3}<0$

$p_{\text {乙 }}-p_{\text {丙 }}=2 p_{2}\left(p_{1}+p_{3}\right)-4 p_{1} p_{2} p_{3}-\left[2 p_{3}\left(p_{1}+p_{2}\right)-4 p_{1} p_{2} p_{3}\right]=2\left(p_{2}-p_{3}\right) p_{1}<0$

即 $p_{\text {甲 }}<p_{\text {乙 }}, p_{\text {乙 }}<p_{\text {丙 }}$,

则该棋手在第二盘与丙比赛, $p$ 最大.选项 D 判断正确; 选项 BC 判断错误;

$p$ 与该棋手与甲、乙、丙的比赛次序有关.选项 $\mathrm{A}$ 判断错误.

故选: D
question_en:
10. A chess player plays one game with three chess players A, B and C, and the results of each game are independent of each other. It is known that the probability of winning the game between the player and A, B and C are respectively$p_{1}, p_{2}, p_{3}$, and$p_{3}>p_{2}>p_{1}>0$. The probability of the player winning two sets in a row is$p$, but ()
A.$p$Has nothing to do with the order of the game between the player and A, B and C
B. The player plays against A in the second set,$p$maximum
C. The player plays against B in the second set,$p$maximum
D. The player plays against C in the second set,$p$maximum
analysis_en:
【Detailed explanation】The player won two consecutive games, and the second game is the winning game.

The probability of the player winning two sets in a row is$p_{\text {甲 }}$then $p_{\text {甲 }}=2\left(1-p_{2}\right) p_{1} p_{3}+2 p_{2} p_{1}\left(1-p_{3}\right)=2 p_{1}\left(p_{2}+p_{3}\right)-4 p_{1} p_{2} p_{3}$The probability of the player winning two consecutive games is$p_{\text {乙 }}$then $p_{\text {乙 }}=2\left(1-p_{1}\right) p_{2} p_{3}+2 p_{1} p_{2}\left(1-p_{3}\right)=2 p_{2}\left(p_{1}+p_{3}\right)-4 p_{1} p_{2} p_{3}$The probability of the player winning two sets in a row is$p_{\text {丙 }}$then $p_{\text {丙 }}=2\left(1-p_{1}\right) p_{3} p_{2}+2 p_{1} p_{3}\left(1-p_{2}\right)=2 p_{3}\left(p_{1}+p_{2}\right)-4 p_{1} p_{2} p_{3}$then $p_{\text {甲 }}-p_{\text {乙 }}=2 p_{1}\left(p_{2}+p_{3}\right)-4 p_{1} p_{2} p_{3}-\left[2 p_{2}\left(p_{1}+p_{3}\right)-4 p_{1} p_{2} p_{3}\right]=2\left(p_{1}-p_{2}\right) p_{3}<0$$p_{\text {乙 }}-p_{\text {丙 }}=2 p_{2}\left(p_{1}+p_{3}\right)-4 p_{1} p_{2} p_{3}-\left[2 p_{3}\left(p_{1}+p_{2}\right)-4 p_{1} p_{2} p_{3}\right]=2\left(p_{2}-p_{3}\right) p_{1}<0$So $p_{\text {甲 }}<p_{\text {乙 }}, p_{\text {乙 }}<p_{\text {丙 }}$,

Then the player will play against C in the second set,$p$Maximum. Option D is correct in judgment; Option BC is wrong in judgment;$p$Related to the order of the game between the player and A, B and C. Options$\mathrm{A}$Incorrect judgment.

So, the correct answer is: D

question:
12. 已知函数 $f(x), g(x)$ 的定义域均为 $\mathbf{R}$, 且 $f(x)+g(2-x)=5, g(x)-f(x-4)=7$. 若 $y=g(x)$ 的图像关于直线 $x=2$ 对称, $g(2)=4$ ， 则 $\sum_{k=1}^{22} f(k)=()$
A. -21
B. -22
C. -23
D. -24
question_en:
12. Given functions$f(x), g(x)$The domains of$\mathbf{R}$, and$f(x)+g(2-x)=5, g(x)-f(x-4)=7$. like$y=g(x)$Image about straight lines$x=2$symmetry,$g(2)=4$, then $\sum_{k=1}^{22} f(k)=()$A. -21
B. -22
C. -23
D. -24
analysis_en:
【Detailed explanation】Because$y=g(x)$Image about straight lines$x=2$symmetry,

so$g(2-x)=g(x+2)$,

because$g(x)-f(x-4)=7$, so$g(x+2)-f(x-2)=7$, So $g(x+2)=7+f(x-2)$,

because$f(x)+g(2-x)=5$, so$f(x)+g(x+2)=5$,

Receive others$f(x)+[7+f(x-2)]=5$, So $f(x)+f(x-2)=-2$,

so$f(3)+f(5)+\ldots+f(21)=(-2) \times 5=-10$,$f(4)+f(6)+\ldots+f(22)=(-2) \times 5=-10$because$f(x)+g(2-x)=5$, so$f(0)+g(2)=5$, So $f(0)=1$, so$f(2)=-2-f(0)=-3$because$g(x)-f(x-4)=7$, so$g(x+4)-f(x)=7$, and because$f(x)+g(2-x)=5$,

Jointly,$g(2-x)+g(x+4)=12$,

so$y=g(x)$Image about dots$(3,6)$Center symmetry, because function$g(x)$The domain of definition is$\mathbf{R}$,

so$g(3)=6$because$f(x)+g(x+2)=5$, so$f(1)=5-g(3)=-1$.

so$$\sum_{k=1}^{22} f(k)=f(1)+f(2)+[f(3)+f(5)+\ldots+f(21)]+[f(4)+f(6)+\ldots+f(22)]=-1-3-10-10=-24$$So, the correct answer is: D

question:
1. 若 $z=-1+\sqrt{3} \mathbf{i}$, 则 $\frac{z}{z \bar{z}-1}=()$
A. $-1+\sqrt{3} \mathrm{i}$
B. $-1-\sqrt{3} i$
C. $-\frac{1}{3}+\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3} \mathrm{i}$
D. $-\frac{1}{3}-\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3} i$
analysis:
【详解】 $\bar{z}=-1-\sqrt{3} i, z \bar{z}=(-1+\sqrt{3} i)(-1-\sqrt{3} i)=1+3=4$.

$\frac{z}{z \bar{z}-1}=\frac{-1+\sqrt{3} \mathrm{i}}{3}=-\frac{1}{3}+\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3} \mathrm{i}$

故选: C
question_en: 1. If$z=-1+\sqrt{3} \mathbf{i}$, then $\frac{z}{z \bar{z}-1}=()$A.$-1+\sqrt{3} \mathrm{i}$B.$-1-\sqrt{3} i$C.$-\frac{1}{3}+\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3} \mathrm{i}$D.$-\frac{1}{3}-\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3} i$
analysis_en: 【Detailed explanation】$\bar{z}=-1-\sqrt{3} i, z \bar{z}=(-1+\sqrt{3} i)(-1-\sqrt{3} i)=1+3=4$.$\frac{z}{z \bar{z}-1}=\frac{-1+\sqrt{3} \mathrm{i}}{3}=-\frac{1}{3}+\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3} \mathrm{i}$So, the correct answer is: C

question:
3. 设全集 $U=\{-2,-1,0,1,2,3\}$, 集合 $A=\{-1,2\}, B=\left\{x \mid x^{2}-4 x+3=0\right\}$, 则 $\partial(A \cup B)=()$

B. $\{0,3\}$
C. $\{-2,1\}$
D.

$\{-2,0\}$

so$\partial_{U}(A \cup B)=\{-2,0\}$.

So, the correct answer is: D.

question:
6. 当 $x=1$ 时, 函数 $f(x)=a \ln x+\frac{b}{x}$ 取得最大值 -2 , 则 $f^{\prime}(2)=()$
A. -1
B. $-\frac{1}{2}$
C. $\frac{1}{2}$
D. 1
analysis:
【详解】因为函数 $f(x)$ 定义域为 $(0,+\infty)$, 所以依题可知, $f(1)=-2, f^{\prime}(1)=0$, 而 $f^{\prime}(x)=\frac{a}{x}-\frac{b}{x^{2}}$, 所以 $b=-2, a-b=0$, 即 $a=-2, b=-2$, 所以 $f^{\prime}(x)=-\frac{2}{x}+\frac{2}{x^{2}}$, 因 此函数 $f(x)$ 在 $(0,1)$ 上递增, 在 $(1,+\infty)$ 上递减, $x=1$ 时取最大值, 满足题意, 即有 $f^{\prime}(2)=-1+\frac{1}{2}=-\frac{1}{2}$

故选: B.
question_en:

B.$-\frac{1}{2}$C.$\frac{1}{2}$D. 1
analysis_en: 【Detailed explanation】Because the function$f(x)$Defined domain as$(0,+\infty)$, so according to the question,$f(1)=-2, f^{\prime}(1)=0$, and$f^{\prime}(x)=\frac{a}{x}-\frac{b}{x^{2}}$, so$b=-2, a-b=0$, So $a=-2, b=-2$, so$f^{\prime}(x)=-\frac{2}{x}+\frac{2}{x^{2}}$, therefore the function$f(x)$exist$(0,1)$Increment on$(1,+\infty)$Decreasing,$x=1$When the maximum value is satisfied, it will be$f^{\prime}(2)=-1+\frac{1}{2}=-\frac{1}{2}$So, the correct answer is: B.

question:
10. 椭圆 $C: \frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$ 的左顶点为 $A$, 点 $P, Q$ 均在 $C$ 上, 且关于 $y$ 轴对称. 若 直线 $A P, A Q$ 的斜率之积为 $\frac{1}{4}$, 则 $C$ 的离心率为 ()
A. $\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}$
B. $\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}$
C. $\frac{1}{2}$
D. $\frac{1}{3}$
question_en:
10. Oval$C: \frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$The left vertex of$A$, point$P, Q$All are$C$On, and about$y$Axially symmetric. If a straight line$A P, A Q$The product of the slope is$\frac{1}{4}$, then $C$The eccentricity rate is ()
A.$\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}$B.$\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}$C.$\frac{1}{2}$D.$\frac{1}{3}$
analysis_en:
【Detailed explanation】Solution:$A(-a, 0)$,

set up$P\left(x_{1}, y_{1}\right)$, then $Q\left(-x_{1}, y_{1}\right)$,

then $k_{A P}=\frac{y_{1}}{x_{1}+a}, k_{A Q}=\frac{y_{1}}{-x_{1}+a}$,

So$k_{A P} \cdot k_{A Q}=\frac{y_{1}}{x_{1}+a} \cdot \frac{y_{1}}{-x_{1}+a}=\frac{y_{1}^{2}}{-x_{1}^{2}+a^{2}}=\frac{1}{4}$,

again$\frac{x_{1}^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y_{1}^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$, then $y_{1}^{2}=\frac{b^{2}\left(a^{2}-x_{1}^{2}\right)}{a^{2}}$,

so$\frac{\frac{b^{2}\left(a^{2}-x_{1}^{2}\right)}{a^{2}}}{-x_{1}^{2}+a^{2}}=\frac{1}{4}$, So $\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}=\frac{1}{4}$,

So the ellipse$C$eccentricity rate$e=\frac{c}{a}=\sqrt{1-\frac{b^{2}}{a^{2}}}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}$.

So, the correct answer is: A.

question:
12. 已知 $a=\frac{31}{32}, b=\cos \frac{1}{4}, c=4 \sin \frac{1}{4}$, 则 ()
A. $c>b>a$
B. $b>a>c$
C. $a>b>c$
D.

$a>c>b$
analysis:
【详解】因为 $\frac{c}{b}=4 \tan \frac{1}{4}$, 因为当 $x \in\left(0, \frac{\pi}{2}\right), \sin x<x<\tan x$

所以 $\tan \frac{1}{4}>\frac{1}{4}$, 即 $\frac{c}{b}>1$, 所以 $c>b$;

设 $f(x)=\cos x+\frac{1}{2} x^{2}-1, x \in(0,+\infty)$, $f^{\prime}(x)=-\sin x+x>0$, 所以 $f(x)$ 在 $(0,+\infty)$ 单调递增,

则 $f\left(\frac{1}{4}\right)>f(0)=0$, 所以 $\cos \frac{1}{4}-\frac{31}{32}>0$ ，

所以 $b>a$, 所以 $c>b>a$,

故选: A
question_en:
12. Given$a=\frac{31}{32}, b=\cos \frac{1}{4}, c=4 \sin \frac{1}{4}$, but ()
A.$c>b>a$B.$b>a>c$C.$a>b>c$D.$a>c>b$
analysis_en:
【Detailed explanation】Because$\frac{c}{b}=4 \tan \frac{1}{4}$, because$x \in\left(0, \frac{\pi}{2}\right), \sin x<x<\tan x$so$\tan \frac{1}{4}>\frac{1}{4}$, So $\frac{c}{b}>1$, so$c>b$;

set up$f(x)=\cos x+\frac{1}{2} x^{2}-1, x \in(0,+\infty)$,$f^{\prime}(x)=-\sin x+x>0$, so$f(x)$exist$(0,+\infty)$monotonically increasing,

then $f\left(\frac{1}{4}\right)>f(0)=0$, so$\cos \frac{1}{4}-\frac{31}{32}>0$,

so$b>a$, so$c>b>a$,

So, the correct answer is: A
